title: Where did it go?  No Control Issue
text:
[UPDATE: Holy Stone has contacted me from my email to them and has offered a replacement. This is outstanding customer service and they really do appear to stand behind their products. I will give it another run and hopefully the new drone works out much better. I see mostly 5 star review and want to be like them, happy with the drone.]

This drone has dangerous issues with control. I followed all of the directions to set the calibrations by spinning the drone, I synced it to my wifi, checked the connections and the satellites, and all rest. On it's first flight it went nuts right after take off and slammed into the trees across the street, but luckily hit the grass and took the hit well. I was then able to fly it for a few days well. Included are shots from Central Park in Huntington Beach, California to prove I learned how to fly it without issue. The drone pulled the same stunt a few days later, but I was able to luckily force it down and it was alright on the second uncontrolled flight. Well, today I took it down to the beach at PCH in Huntington Beach, CA. I did all of the calibrations and syncing, it showed 17 satellites, and full connection. I took it off and then when I tried to make it elevate it shot up about 70 feet, banked hard towards PCH and went full blast across the street (that sucked, I was 400 yards away and blasted into some palm trees across PCH and hit the Condos. Where it landed, I do not know after an hour search. I hope someone from the condos calls off the phone number I wrote on it. I am glad it didn't hurt someone or damage someone's car. I can't recommend this drone at all with a dangerous issue like that, which also costs you the entire purchase price of the drone. Is anyone in the market for the controller? It's only been used about a dozen times. =(

The Return To Home did not work but I was able to pilot the drone back. On the last flight the drone hovered near me at 5 ft then crashed at an angle into the street when I tried to land it. This caused a rear arm to break. Repairing it is beyond my skill level.

I'm posting this review as the crash and the failure to start was probably due to a poor GPS signal. Do not try to fly unless you have a good GPS signal! The drone itself seems well made and comparable to higher priced drones but may be less sturdy.

title: A very good drone for the money and fun to fly
text:
I purchased this drone after looking at the features and reading reviews of various drones. First, overall, this a very good drone for the money. I was pleasantly surprised by the features and that everything worked as advertised. This is the first Holly Stone drone I have used or set up, I took a little time to do so. First, I recommend that any purchaser review the full manual in its entirety along with the quick start manual before setting up the drone or attempting flight. Second, download the Ophelia Go software. Once you have familiarized yourself with the set up procedures and controls, the drone is easy to set up and to fly. My only glitch was trying to set up the compass calibration as the icon on the controller disappeared too fast, but the Ophelia software took care of calibration later. For beginners, trying set up or fly the drone without understanding the manual and controls will very likely lead to problems.

Once set up, the drone flew perfectly. I have tested the drone in winds up to 12-13 mph. The controls and camera worked as expected. The camera can be swiveled in a 90 degree arc. From directly forward to a down position. That works well. Due to the software, the drone can hover in place without effort on the part of the operator. That alone sets it apart from several drones and makes flying this drone a pleasure. I have taken panoramic videos hovering at 200ft, and videos while flying the drone at full speed 2 feet above the ground. I have found that the drone can move too fast for the video function and there can be some lag. Pictures are saved within the Ophelia app if you do not use a memory card in the drone. From my reading, pictures are saved at a lower resolution in the app than on the memory card.

Next, I tested the "follow me" function. This one is finicky. Too far away and the drone seems to lose its connection. When it works, it works as advertised. I did this test at walking speed, so I don't know if there are any speed limitations to this function. The "orbit flight" works. I have not tried the "headless mode" yet. The "tap fly" function works, but I would prefer that I be able to set a route before the drone is in the air. A route is traced out and the drone flys to the waypoint and stops briefly before moving to the next waypoint. Working with this program function some more may reveal additional tricks. However, given the price of this drone, the software is excellent. Another great feature is the "return to home" function. One button to recall the drone. In my tests, the drone consistently landed within 2 feet of its take off point using this function. On one return, the drone landed within 6 inches of its takeoff point.

The major con for this drone is the battery. The battery last about 25 minutes. It takes about 5 hours to recharge (5v/2a). A test using 5v/1.6a charger takes about 7 hours. The dual battery charger that comes with the drone really only charges one battery at time. It charges them consecutively instead of concurrently. For the time, you will need several batteries if you want to fly a long time. Another con, but this may be the phone. The Ophelia app/phone seems to lose connection with the drone on occasion when the drone is more than 6-700 feet away. This does not seem to affect the return to home function. Once the drone is recalled using the controller, and gets closer, the drone generally reconnects, but not always.

Overall, I recommend the drone. Since it is easy to fly, it is easy to have fun.

title: HS720 review
text: Excellent drone, easy to learn, great range (as described, about 1km), returns "home" when signal is lost. Make sure to calibrate it EVERY TIME though. Very stable in light wind, holds position amazingly well, unlike cheaper model (under $100) that we had prior to HS720. I saw people complaining about image and video quality. I am very happy about both. Good resolution, a little round along the edges (video) but it's OK. Touch & feel is of quality materials and quality construction. Flight time about 20 min, which is amazing compared to same price point competition. Phone slips out from remote phone holder at times, because the bottom "lip" is too narrow, but that's OK, we found an alternative solution. Battery is "solid", literally and figuratively, high quality, easy to put in and take out, unlike cheaper "twist-wire-every-time" tiny connectors on cheaper model we had. Overall 95% satisfied and recommend it to anyone!

I sent an email to usaholystone today about not being able to see the cam view on my phone.  I got what I consider a prompt reply! title: Novice review of the HS720
text:
I don't normally write reviews but felt inclined to do so on this product. I have only had the drone a couple days. I am 100% noive...first drone and first time doing anything RC. The night i received i got stupid and took it up in the house. Needless to say hard crash into ceiling, couple walls and fridge before coming to a slam down rest on a hardwood floor. I cant stress "hard" enough and the drone doen't have a scratch on the body or legs. The props did sustain very minor nicks. Flew outside the next day and this drone is easy to take off and land with the one touch button. Hovers nicely with a little toilet bowl action (not a big deal). Controls are easy to operate and the camera switch works grt. The phone holder holds my galaxy 9 note just fine. Didn't get to use many funtions but the one touch on/off (take off & land). But that works grt. Highly recommend this drone for the novice and/or experienced.

One note...the antennas DO actually aquire sats. I had them pointed down (due to watching youtube vids that advised they are non-functional) and could not aquire any sats. Turned them up and aquired 13 sats.

title: Really nice entry level gps drone!
text: This drone is easy to flight outdoors. The gps and optical sensor make it stable. It is powerful and heavy enough to handle the wind. It has good picture quality and above average features for the price range. The features work really well with a short learning curve. It comes with very nice case and everything fits neatly and small enough to be portable. For my level this drone is very fast and responsive while still being easy to fly. It has lights on the arms and the bottom which makes it easy to fly in low light conditions!

title: loss of control
text: Great customer service rep. During the first flight the unit was very controllable for about two minutes. Started off in an open field flying a few feet off the ground in a ten-foot square area. Increased both altitude and area to 8 to ten feet and a 20 by 20-foot area. made an additional increase in altitude to about 20 feet. after a few maneuvers, lost all control function and the drone began a large uncontrolled circle and crashed into a wire fence destroying one of the motors and the housing. Looks like a common issue.

title: Awesome drone

title: East learning curve, great photos.
text:
Photo is from my first flight, it's good. I'm happy but question ceiling height and I could not rotate the drone when it got away from me a little ways. Overall happy.

UPDATE: My flight was restricted in beginners mode. I switched it off and now can fly up to the clouds and rotate isn't an issue. A great drone...

title: Highly durable drone. Great for beginners
text: Great beginners and intermediate drone. Could have better camera but for the price this is an outstanding product. Extremely durable. Crashed a couple of times and it is still chugging along. Remote holds my Note 9 with no issues. Remote control is really user friendly. Something to mention is having to calibrate with each use but only takes a few seconds. Highly recommend this drone.

title: Pic and video is great
text: This drone is my first ever and was very happy how easy it is to fly. The only thing I wish I had thought about getting on the drone is having the crash avoidance because learning to fly for the first time you might crash it. üòÇ overall I‚Äôm very pleased with it and would recommend this drone to anyone.

title: Very Good Drone
text:
Drone is very easy to set up and fly for a beginner. Straight forward controls and the controller is comfortable to hold. The drone is very responsive.
Only drawback is battery takes awhile to charge, recommend two batteries. I got 20 minutes flight time and still had charge in the battery. Great customer service.
I would recommend this drone.

title: Gps rth, circular flight, point of intess and durability.
text: The drone is compact, durable and user-friendly. I bought specifically for the follow me, rth option and camera. All functions work as described. The point of interest option is amazing and the circular flight option. For being durable, I crashed it twice and this was due to my error. The drone is very stable in flight. Very responsive flies smoothly. I flew it in very choppy wind and it was surprising super stable. The picture quality is amazing. It I had to purchase another drone it would definitely be a holy stone. I love this drone.

title: Great Starter Drone for Adults and older kids.

title: .  Great product and exceptional customer service

title: Compared so many - no regrets here
text:
Like many of you I read 100‚Äôs of reviews and looked at what seemed to be like capabilities across multiple vendors. I‚Äôm VERY happy with my purchase. Price point is fair, drone quality is great and the support that I‚Äôve received from the vendor is second to none! Some of the things that I like about this drone:
‚Ä¢ Drone: Solid look and feel of drone ‚Äì yes its mostly plastic but has survived a few bumps and crashes. The brushless motors/propellers are pretty quiet and responsive. The drone drifts a bit, might be one of my propellers is off a bit.
‚Ä¢ Remote/Controller: nice quality ‚Äì the LCD is helpful and provides basic info. Your phone is held pretty well in the springs/clips to where it does not feel like it will fall out.
‚Ä¢ iOS APP ‚Äì works well and simple to use. Easy to set limits and advanced configs
‚Ä¢ Battery ‚Äì easy :20 or so each time. It is SLOW to charge and would be great if a 2nd battery was included in the base package.
‚Ä¢ Support ‚Äì fast response. Helped to remediate my problem quickly and without bickering over cost, etc. Customer-first attitude!
‚Ä¢ Camera ‚Äì clear picture, no problems. I do wish the rotation was bit slower from the remote as it‚Äôs a bit fast and jerky moving up/down.
‚Ä¢ Case ‚Äì a nice bonus. I like that it protects the drone and accessories for easy travel.

Overall ‚Äì Recommend it. Just do it!

title: Great value, Great for Beginners
text: After reading a lot of reviews, my husband and I decided on The Holy Stone drone.  We absolutely love the amount of features we got for the money.  We like that it takes amazing pictures, video, and it is super easy to get started flying and great for beginners.

title: Great quality and ready to fly!
text:
Bought this drone as a birthday gift and I was super excited starting with the opening of the box. You could tell everything was made from high quality material. The drone also comes with everything you need to get started right away. My favorite feature is probably it's collapsible arms making it extremely compact in its case. It would be easy to stick the case in a backpack for a fun adventure. ¬†

Since this was my first drone, I didn't master the controls right away and had a few accidents. The drone survived hitting a wall and multiple trees with only a few scratches and nicks. It has noticeably heavy duty construction that's made to absorb some beginner mistakes. There are endless features to have fun with this drone. From flying for fun to creating epic drone videos, there is truly a high skill ceiling for this device.

The initial flight was on a day with much higher than recommended wind gusts. Despite this, the drone was easy to control and the Return Home feature brought it within a foot of the planned landing pad.

This is a great starter drone. I have focused mainly on learning to fly the drone and only used the camera once. The pictures I took were clear and easily transferred to my computer. This drone is highly recommended.

title: Capatability Issues with Drone App

For whatever reason it will not work with a Pixel 3 and I've read that it will not work with the newer Samsung Galaxy. Thankfully I have an older spare phone I can use just for this, but it is definitely annoying. However, even if the app doesn't work, you do not need it to use it. title: Excellent operation and best customer service I ever saw
text: [[VIDEOID:1d41c1467c2b3de37ad36e5cd2248de4]] This was my first "premium drone". It's extremely easy to operate. BUT, after contacting Holy Stone regarding this and they actually replaced the item. I never had to send anything back so I get an extra remote. I have never seen this before, it was arguably probably my fault but they just stand by their products. The only downside is that they send you one one battery that takes several hours to fully charge from dead and when I bought the drone the spare batteries were out of stock so I would recommend purchasing at least one extra battery if they are in stock. Overall I would definitely recommend this item to people whom are looking to purchase a drone. I've attached a video that was taken at night and used the landing lights that are very bright.

title: Super Fun Drone and Great Customer Service
text: I'm new to flying drones so I bought this hoping to get something decent at a low price.  It is a total blast to fly.  Pictures and video are nice and it makes me want to get even more into this as a hobby.  Maybe I was over-confident one day, but there was a tiny mishap. title: Just the Drone for a beginner!
text:
I have been thinking of getting a drone for a long time, but after hearing horror stories of people crashing their drones on the first day, I decided to wait awhile. After reading the good reviews from different sites, I decided to go ahead with this drone.
My drone arrived last week but finally found the time get my license, read the manual, charge the battery and take my drone to the park.
Just the drone for a beginner, the auto take off button takes the drone to a safe height from which you can take over. It was easy to fly despite the 8.2 mph winds at the park. I took the drone as far as I could see and then let the auto return feature bring it back for me. The video feed was good but I don't know how to record that yet, so I just shot still photos. If you are a beginner, this is just the drone for you.

title: Good so far
text: Use it just for fun. Easy to get in the air.

title: Holy Stone has GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE
text:
Just purchased this drone and still learning. I had a few questions and sent an email to Holy Stone. I was very happy when i received a reply within a short time. I also called them and spoke to a rep in a few min (not long at all). Did my first flit and found it easy to fly. Didn't try anything too crazy since I am still learning. Great product for the price and excellent customer service.

I recently had a misshape with my drone. I had one of the prop assemblies come off during a flight. Thu=is was due to a prier bump. I contacted Holy Stone with a photo of the broken arm. I was sent all the parts needed for repair as well as a YouTube Video link on how to make the repair. They are so helpful, I would recommend them completely. Their customer service is a great as their product.
.

title: This must have been Mr. Glass' Drone from Unbreakable
text:
In a world where you can't collide or crash this drone would be cool but since that's not reality, fly safely and away from things that you can crash into.

This is a cool drone with a lot of features and good speed...but the propeller arms are really fragile. You might consider bracing all of the propeller arms and connections in order to survive crashes. There's a good 90 day part replacement policy from the manufacturer for parts and their customer service is amazing.

Minus one star just for having to modify the drone to make it last longer.

title: Easy to learn and fly
text: Never flew a drone before. This was easy to learn. Takes great photos using the app.

title: First drone
text: This is my first drone I am totally amazed at how easy this drone is to fly I have only flown it a few times and loved every minute of it. I‚Äôm still learning how to do things with it but having fun learning. I would totally recommend this drone to anyone. Thanks for making it fun and easy

title: Great beginner drone
text: I really liked the drone for its simplicity and mode of operation. I wish it could have some default shooting modes like rotating around me and then going up to capture my sourroundins .But over all this is best drone.

title: Newbie first real flight
text: [[VIDEOID:fc56654987f51c555b121e9016465093]] I had flown the drone a couple of times in the back yard following it around just a few feet away from it. This review is of the first time I went somewhere I had room to actually fly the HS720. The camera was in the standard (not 4K) mode. There is a lot more the drone can do that I did not even try today. The HS720 is very easy to control, even with light wind that was present. The only feature I tested today was RTH and it brought the drone back to within a couple of feet of the takeoff point. If weather permits I will go out again tomorrow to test more of the HS720 features. I spent months looking at various drones at this price range and above and am very happy with the choice to go with the HS720.

title: Great Drone for the price
text: I like everything, did my homework for 2 months before purchasing. Check out other peoples videos, very helpful in setting it up and flying it. Great for beginners.

title: Takes a tiny bit of work but once it's going it is a breeze
text: This is the first drone I've ever bought or owned and it is unbelievable how intuitive it is! Make sure to first start using it in an open area, just to be safe. However, I began using it in my backyard and there were multiple times when I thought I would crash it into my house or a tree or bush but the controller is so responsive that even the slightest flick in the opposite direction will save it. Even then, I got cocky and tried to test my skills and crashed it into a playset and, while trying to correct, slammed into a palm tree. The drone went down and stopped running immediately and I feared the first. Sure enough, the drone was absolutely fine and operated like the crash never happened. I even accidentally put my finger in the blades while they were running when I went to pick it up and it didn't damage them and all it did to me was make my finger numb for 10 seconds. I cannot suggest this drone enough for pretty much anyone, I bought it for recording paintball and it has already been useful despite my neglectful care. I suggest 13+ because it is difficult to understand the effect and power video capturing drones hold, specifically considering privacy so 13+ is probably best, 18+ realistically. Similarly, at 32 with 25 years of video game experience I still struggled to learn the controls and could have very easily crashed into a power line if I was not careful.

title: Read the manual carefully, get a landing pad
text:
The Holy Stone HS720 is a very easy drone to fly. I have some experience, but each drone is a little different, so I can't suggest strongly enough to read the manual carefully. After charging the batteries fully, and finding an unobstructed area to test the drone. After reading the manual to the point that the pages were falling out of the manual, I went through all the procedures to start the drone. Be patient. It takes some time for the drone to communicate with the controller and phone, if you choose to use one. I set up the landing pad, (which I strongly recommend, too) and started the drone. I found the controls very responsive, and the interface between phone and camera to take some getting used to. It locked upon several times so there were times I didn't know exactly where the drone was. Twice during the initial flight, the connection between the drone and the controller was lost. The drone immediately hovered to 50 or so feet, and returned to the landing pad and hovered. I tried to take several videos and pictures, but to no avail. I used a Sandisk Extreme, 64gb card in the drone. It is my opinion the recording would be the fastest if recorded directly to a card instead of recording from drone to my phone through the app. Further testing on this will be required. After the long recharging time. The charge cord is way too short, and the Holy Stone company needs to review this as well.
The Ophelia app is a little confusing, but I feel even a novice or beginner can learn it pretty quickly with practice. The best way to answer any questions is the internet as the manual offers little insight into the operation of the app.
This is a fun drone to fly, Even at the slowest speed, it is responsive, quick, and nimble. And don't forget to get a landing pad that is at least 30". Mine is 32" and the drone can easily find it. Every landing I made was within those 32", which is pretty impressive. Just plain fun!

title: Unbreakable By A Beginner
text: Love this little drone! First time out I followed all the rules and brought my drone into the front yard. Connected it, raised it up about 1 foot off the ground to have a big gust of wind flip it over into a bed of wood shavings!  After finally finding the OFF button, we picked it up and dusted it off. Amazingly, none of the propellers were broken! The second time I tried flying, I raised it up and watched the wind take it away again and almost hit a car! Needless to say I need a few more lessons on flying. But the ease of use with the remote control is nice!  I'll check back in after a few more flights under my belt.

title: A drone the entire family can enjoy!
text:
I purchased the hs720 after doing a lot of research and reading many reviews. I have flown r/c helicopters for many years and decided to check out all of the drone hype. After purchasing the hs720 and flying it, I noticed some issues with it‚Äôs flight characteristics. I was real nervous making the call to ‚ÄúCustomer Service ‚Äú to explain my situation regarding the drone. My past experience has not been a good one when dealing with companies over the phone about their products. To my surprise, it was just the opposite. I spoke with Jan and he was very curious about the issues, asked lots of questions and then resolved my situation with a smile. Most often, products purchased through the ‚ÄúMail‚Äù of the electronics nature become a ‚ÄúOne and Done‚Äù type thing. My experience with Holystone has made me a trusting customer that with now purchase future products from them with confidence.
As for the hs720, it lives up to the hype of all of the reviews I read. Easy, stable and is enjoyable to fly. Battery life is pretty close to stated times although I haven‚Äôt clocked them with a stopwatch. Product is durable and well worth the money. Life is short, enjoy it!

title: First "real" drone... Intuitive
text:
[[VIDEOID:4d561cd22479c1d6347699801c1bd487]] After a month, I can say that I'm very happy with this drone. It's easy to use. It took me more time to learn how to use the droid app then it did to run the drone controls. The battery life is great. I had it actually "go home" once, after a low battery. It landed within a foot of where it started more than 20 minutes earlier.

I have a few photos and videos, including one of the drone. The lens gives you some "fish eye" effect for those portions in the picture that are above or below the horizontal center line. North Dakota lakes gives you big horizons to look over. I've run it in temperatures as low as 10 degrees F (-12C), it did great. There was a steady 10MPH winds during the day of the fishing tournament.

It takes some time to figure out how to get the best possible shots while flying as wind and sudden movements can cause you to lose subject. I'll eventually upgrade to a drone with a better gimbal and glass, but this setup will help me build some confidence.

I'm guessing well over 40mph. Video quality not the best but just okay. On occasions I found the auto take off were wobble or it had problems finding a steady footprint, so I only manually take off. But probably due to I live in a high interference area. I also highly recommend a second battery due to the long recharge time. But flight times I'm getting 22 to 24 minutes. In high mode I got 21.

title: Holy Stone HS720
text:
What a drone. For $299, this drone is almost good as a $1000 drone.

The drone is easy to set up and calibrate and I was flying this with ease as a beginner. I am finally happy to have a drone that actually does what I want.

The flight time I got was around 18 minutes. Still fantastic compared to other drives that fly only about 10 minutes. But I definitely recommend getting another battery for extra flying time.

The gps feature is fantastic and comes very close to where you took off. The height easily goes 400 feet and the range from my brief test went about 2200 feet.

You will never lose the drone w the one button return home as well as returning home when you are low on battery.

I tested the Follow Me and Orbit mode and it works. Not great but good enough.

The only con is that the battery takes 5-7 hours to charge. Another reason to get the extra battery. Overall, fantastic drone.

title: Works as described plus a responsive Customer Service
text:
I have no previous experience with drones so I can not compare this one to any other. The documentation for a Quick Start is very good. The drone itself seems very well built. It is quieter than others I have heard.
The remote control works very smoothly. The "Return to Home" feature is very handy and works well. The camera provides high quality pictures and it easy to operate. This unit meets my objective very well.

title: Amazing Features & Quality
text: The blades are really good and smooth. The features are also awesome. The texture and the design are incredible.The only thing is that the done needs obstacle avoidance. Other than that, this is the best drone I‚Äôve ever had.

title: Fun little drone and excellent customer service
text: Had trouble with my first one and crashed it bad.  Holy Stone customer service contact me to make sure I was happy and upon learning I was not, they replaced the drone with a new one.

title: This Product and Company is Amazing
text: [[VIDEOID:be572f32da141cf658bb00279c355d80]] Ok this drone is so Amazing!  I got it so in the future if I need to send it out, and see what‚Äôs going on around my home, I can do so.  God for bid something crazy happens, I have eyes out in the sky. This company is amazing I had a issue due to user error early on after I received the first it. I let them know what happened and they super exceeded my expectations, on their solution. Not a normal solution from a company. I can say again they made it right in a big way. The drone is great, easy to use, I never used a drone before. The picture is super clear. The camera is amazing, I love love love this product! I‚Äôm very new to drones so I don‚Äôt have a bunch of tacky talk but I guess what I need done the camera is amazing, it sounds strong when it flies, and I will for sure be purchasing more products from this company! THANK YOU Holy stone!

title: Very Nice...
text:
Loving this drone. Kind of pissed though, not even two weeks and its onsale for 30$ less than I bought it for. Love the pictures and the video, as I know it is a dampened camera you will always get some shake, but like I said I do love this drone.

Side note, get an extra battery if you do get this, just loving this thing. Still ticked off though.

title: Many of the best features
text: The HS720 worked as promised right out of the box.  The video features and the control app are easy to understand and master.  The camera is excellent quality.  wish the camera angle was a little smoother but the more I use it the better control feel I get

title: Solid Product
text: I purchased this drone as a step up front existing one. Its setup was fairly easy and took me a little time to figure a couple things out but overall a solid product.

title: Its Easy to fly
text: I started out with toy drones, wow the difference is amazing I can fly this right where I want to without any issues. Taking videos and pictures is easy and the controller is intuitive.  Hooking up to your phone is great and you have lots of special things you can do with the app.  I've flown it to 350 feet and had no problems and where I live we have a lot of wind and the drone still holds its own.  I love this drone! I bought two extra batteries and a large sd card to fly for over an hour.  It does take a while to charge the batteries.  I crashed a couple of times and was able to repair without even using any of the extra parts it came with. SO MUCH FUN! Comes with a great case too.

title: Great Customer Service
text: Had some initial issues with the drone but the customer service was great. They were very responsive and corrected the issue. Great Customer Service! Will update the review once I have more time with the drone.

title: High-quality drone
text: This product is amazing.  Super quality and camera is very high-quality.  You can feel the compact power that this drone has. I wasn't expecting this type of machine for a couple hundred bucks.  The solidness of the drone and its ability to fly as far as you can see it simply blows me away.

title: Great drone for for the price!
text: The HS720 was my first drone and I loved how easy and enjoyable it was to fly. It‚Äôs perfect for beginners but still has all the features of drones that cost 4 times this one. Customer Service was excellent also!

title: Great product
text: East my to use, great battery life. Worth the price!

title: A quality product with excellent performance and a great price!
text: I have purchased more expensive drones from DJI and feel like I wasted my money....  Holly Stone's HS 720 has every feature I could want for a fraction of the cost.  They build them with quality parts.  The motors, radios and internals are all quality components and it shows in the flight and function of the drone.  It's easy enough for my wife and kids to fly and fun and fast enough for me to push it to it's limits.

title: Good flier
text: Good product ez to fly.

title: Availablity of tech support
text: The drone is awesome, flies so effortlessly with my i-phone 11, I fly with my grandson who has one, its our time together. Alone with the tech support I'm very happy.

title: Easy setup and operation!
text:
Very easy setup and operation. I was surprised how quiet it was. At about 40' high it was almost silent.

Got it mostly to play with but also to help with my business doing roof inspections and taking pictures of homes I've remodeled from a very cool perspective.

Would definitely recommend.

My only issue was I couldn't find an extra battery for it when I originally ordered and looks like they keep getting backordered.

title: Excellent customer service!!!
text:
Easy to fly, great pictures and videos but customer service is excellent, above and beyond what‚Äôs become the ‚Äúnorm‚Äù these days.
Somehow I managed to break my drone the first day out, I won‚Äôt get into specifics on what happened but somehow i broke one of the arms off. I Called Holy Stone customer service and spoke with Gina who was wonderful. I explained what happened and inquired about purchasing repair parts. She said not to worry their products are covered under a 90 day warranty, she confirmed I purchased through an authorized retailer and I had a whole new drone, controller, battery the entire setup in my hands in 3 business days very surprised an very happy. I have had zero issues with the new drone I really like this model due to its portability, ease of use and the long flight time. The included case is also a really nice feature.

title: Perfect for beginners like me
text: Very easy to set up and very fun to fly. Camera quality is very good.

title: Awesome!!!
text: This is everything they advertised and more. Love it. Customer service is second to none. I‚Äôm a Holy Stone user for life.

title: It was ok
text: So I originally purchased this drone a few weeks ago.  When I received it initially it wouldn't connect to my phone no matter what I did.  So I sent it back to the manufacturer and got a refund.  I was done with it, but the Holy Stone people got a hold of me so they could send me a drone at no cost to me.  Yaay.  So when I got the new drone it worked just as expected.  It connected to my phone and all of the features worked perfectly.  My only issue was that the right joystick on the remote doesn't go back to center, I have to hold it manually to keep it from steering off course.  The spring must be broken on that side or something.  If your lucky enough to receive a drone that doesn't have any issues then it is most certainly worth the buy.

title: DANGEROUS. NEEDS RECALLED
text: Earlier today when I flew this drone (about 10th time), when everything looked fine, all of a sudden it rapidly rolled (as if 2 motors on one side had lost power) and hurtled towards and hit the ground at very high velocity and destroyed itself completely. It was at around 200 meters altitude when this happened and took, I‚Äôd say, less than 2-3 seconds to make contact with the ground. In those few seconds I was extremely concerned that it would hit someone because it traveled down like a bullet and could have caused serious damage had it done that. Amazon and Holystone should investigate why this happened and recall the product before someone dies.

title: Repeated fatal flaws on multiple units
text:
This was a gift for our son, who is 9, and he had no issues flying the drone. The flight was stable and simple enough for him. Using the Opelika go app while flying seems to occasionally cause flight control errors.

Now for the fatal flaw. We grabbed a battery off the charger and headed out to a field for a quick flight session. The battery level.for the drone showed full charge prior to takeoff. I launched the drone and increased the altitude to approximately 40 ft. Suddenly the warning tone sounded and the drone started blinking red. Ok, so the battery went form full to read in less the 15 seconds. I immediately started lowering the drone so we could land it but the 2 of the motors shut off less than 5 seconds after the low battery indications started causing it to drop out of the sky. I was going to try and catch it as it fell but 2 of the motors were still running and I was concerned about being injured by one of the 2 remaining spinning rotors. When it crashed into the snowy ground all 4 rotor arms broke off the main body.

This drone is supposed to have a safe return to home feature where it will return to where it launched from if the battery is low. Obviously there is something wrong with the battery level sensor where it does not start the return process early enough to complete the return once the battery gets low. The drone was only 40 feet above where it had launched and only had enough warning to descend 3 feet's before it came crashing down. I don't see how you can ever trust this feature and the battery warning and prevent routinely crashing and breaking $300 drones?

Holy Stone sent me a replacement. When flying the replacement in our backyard I was simy hovering the drone in the middle of the yard away from any obstacles. Instead of staying steadily in the middle of the yard it began to slowly drift in a circle. That circle got progressively wider, and the controls were unresponsive, eventually crashing the drone into the house resulting in one of the arms breaking.

This is the 3rd Holy Stone drone I've had with fatal flaws. The DJI mini series is more expensive but than these but entirely worth the extra cost if you can afford it.

title: Such a great product
text: [[VIDEOID:e71746c1a1bca1f1ad25aaeecf75cb76]] Its a great drone such a nice balance and very easy product to learn and fly

title: Not bad‚Ä¶not quite great
text: Almost ended up returning this item.  Bought it to teach my kids to fly as it was advertised as a good mid-range option to learn on.  It is well built mechanically and worked ok based on the maiden flight.  As some other users pointed out, there are some definite bugs with the software.  It took multiple attempts to get it to calibrate itself and for the life of me I could not get it to hover in place as advertised, until I used a newer phone.  It continued to drift in circles absent input from the controls initially, which is an issue if you aren‚Äôt familiar with them. Also, controls were spongy at first.  The remote also would periodically unpair mid-flight, which is also problematic.  I‚Äôm going to chalk it up to software incompatibility, as the issues pretty much abated with a different phone. Would give it 5 stars if they correct some of the minor issues.

title: Easy controls.  Bad preflight checklist. Flew Away on 2nd flight.. Customer Service is awesome
text:
Update 9/17/2020- Original can be found at the bottom:

Thank you HolyStone, specifically Mila, who helped me with my issue. I'm hopeful that this time I'll have a better experience when I go out..

Customer Service A++ in my book
_________________

Update 9/12/2020

Today I got the chance to fly my HS720 for the second time. This drone, flew away!!

I took it out to capture content for a YT video.

I ensured my preflight was followed; Full Batteries on Drone and Controller. No interference, No weather related issues such as heat/ cold/ rain/ wind. I performed my Gyro, and GPS calibrations as I normally would with all drones. Connected my phone (Galaxy S10+) with the drones WiFi successfully. Checked settings in app were acceptable and initiated flight, hover; started recording immediately.

I rechecked my battery levels proceeding with the next task, a Follow me. Again ensuring flight safety for the planned task (weather, interference, people, etc). It followed me for about 100feet, before video on my phone showed the drone flying away (banking right); Signal between Phone and Controller was lost. Map in app on my phone was checked to see if the last known position had been saved.

Needless to say, the map data was incorrect. There was 3 of us out there searching for the drone, my 720 is gone, am pretty mad about it as the flight was conducted with absolute situational awareness.

I have emailed support, hoping for some help, however, in reading prior reviews, am not certain what if anything HolyStone would do. As of this writing I am awaiting a response.

_____________Original Review below____________

Received this within 24hrs of order, got lucky.

I was hoping that many reviews overlooked the gyro calibration, however, they did not. Holystone failed to add in the stick movement to complete gyro calibrations. It seems like Left and right sticks to seven o'clock, hold 5seconds. But if I am mistaken, please, correct me.

Recommend to gyro, then gps calibrate. Once that is complete then unlock the motors and happy flying.

Looking forward to many flights.

title: Nice drone
text: Very satisfied with the 720 & 700 bought both. Liked the on & off button on the 700.

title: I have done the research for you.
text: This product is amazing, easy to learn and use. This is my first drone ever, and the video quality is above and beyond. Great attention to details. I did a lot of research before buying. And after 2 months I settled with this one... But I wouldn't call it settleing now that I have had my chance to play with it. Also, be sure to get your drone registered with the FAA, it's only 5 bucks for three years.

title: Easy to use
text: Works great. Easy to use

title: Nice little Drone - Exceptional Customer Support
text:
My wife and I did a lot of research on the available lower priced drones and found the Holystone HS720, After much reading of reviews and watching videos, we decided to go with the HS720. This is a nice compact drone that we plan to take with us on a trip to Europe. I found it easy to learn and fly. It takes very nice videos and the battery performed as advertised. After the initial flight, I ran into issues where the drone would disconnect from my phone. I sent my concerns to Holystone support and they responded right away with a number of things to try to remedy the issue. After trying the items they suggested the issue was still present. They were very sympathetic and interested in resolving the issue for me right away, so they decided to replace the drone with a brand new replacement. I had a new drone in hand after just 5-days after reporting the issue...Exceptional Customer Support!
Looking forward to our trip and taking some great videos. Having extra batteries would be helpful, so please let me know when they become available.

title: Good for beginners
text:
Good drone for beginners as it's quite straight forward to operate. The user manual is easy to read and navigate. I'd recommend you watch a few YouTube videos to streamline the process.

The only two negatives is the battery life. It's pretty bad. I'd recommend you purchase at least two additional batteries so you can have decent flying time. Finally, charging the batteries is just odd, the way that you have to put in the battery to align the charger and the cord being so short was a significant oversight by the designer.

title: This is the perfect Drone for a 1st timer that wants some of the higher priced Drone features!
text: Hello, future Drone owners.  I have always wanted a Drone but heard too many horror stories where the Drone flew off never to be seen again. Most of the drones I looked at with the features I wanted were always way more money than I dared to spend to potentially watch my money fly away.  After years of waiting, I finally decided to buy this one. I have never flown anything prior to this. It was so easy to fly. The button on the remote that allows it to take off and hover at 5 feet on its own is awesome. From there you can just move the levers around on the controller and watch what each level does. Thank you Holy Stone for making it so easy to enjoy this device with very little stress. You cant buy a better Drone in my book for less than $300 I highly recommend buying it. Oh and thank you for including additional blades I did get a little too close to a tree and managed to bang up the blades that came with it.

title: Great Bird for the Price
text:
Great drone for the price. I originally considered a different drone but after reading reviews I opted for the HS720. It comes with a very nice carrying case that holds the drone, remote and my spare batteries.

The setup is easy to follow and will have you flying in a few minutes (once your battery is charged). Pairing the remote with the bird, calibrating the GPS and connecting your phone to the bird via the app is all there is to it.

I‚Äôve flown the drone a few times and it‚Äôs an easy and stable flyer. I would never fly in high winds but have flown this drone in 6-10 mph surface winds and it hovers in place as advertised when using GPS. I‚Äôve had the bird at some significant heights and it holds position very well.

I‚Äôve used the flight path mode several times and it works great. I have not used follow me or or it mode but assume they will work good too.

The controls are straightforward and responsive. I have had the joystick on the right side stick once but attribute that to operator error.

The camera is stable and good.

My only issue is with the battery charging. The connections feel weak and are awkward. That‚Äôs the only reason I didn‚Äôt give a 5 star review

Reviews I‚Äôve read say this drone can compete with the high end birds from DJI and others. Based from my experience I agree.

title: Beautiful
text: I bought this for my husband Christmas gift and he enjoys it, also he plays everyday the backyard, but make sure play the open area. Other than that it's beautiful for taking picture or video.

title: Good Quadcopter for beginners.
text: I am a beginner in the Drone/Quadcopter world. Read the instructions and quick start. Super easy to fly. Battery didn't quite last 26 mins. like it says. Was pretty hot and recording video the whole time tho. Camera works fine. A little jumpy but ok for having fun with. Have ordered a couple more batteries. Very satisfied.

title: Easy to learn drone
text:
Update 07/15/20: So as to not have a backup HS720 another HS720 was ordered and received. This new HS720 flew perfectly. The photos taken of part of my property look very good. The learning curve for the HS720 is an easy one, even for a beginner. The only issue I have with the HS720 is the very long battery charging time.

Update 07/09/20: Looks like Murphy's law wins after all. The new HS720 arrived, but the camera was DOA. The new HS720 was returned and refunded. Is Holy Stone losing its grip on quality control?

Update 07/03/20: I have flown this drone a number of times more. Occasionally I get a loss of signal for a few seconds, but the connection always returns. I contacted Holy Stone about my issue and they asked if there were a lot of trees nearby. The answer is yes there are a lot of trees. Customer support suggested flying my drone in a more open area to avoid losing signal. Even with my issue, this drone has been able to see my 30 acre property in a way not seen before. I was even able to see a beaver swimming in my pond using the drone from hundreds of yards away. The videos have been outstanding. I have had this drone to maximum height and far enough away to stop WiFi returning a video to my phone. Return to home always works. BTW, I have used this drone with both the iPhone SE and Samsung Note 8. To keep this bird in the air longer, I now have four batteries. To ensure that I'm never without this drone functionality, I ordered another hs720 today. Since I will have a spare, Murphy's law should not apply?

I am new to drones and bought this drone based on reviews, mostly from beginners. I found using the controls and Holy Stone Go app easy to use. My cellphone is an iphone SE. I love the ability of this drone to hover in place when not touching any of the controls. I did have one problem. When I tried to use the home button with the drone below a tree the drone rose up an hit the tree branches. This impact damaged the propellers. What I learned was that on hitting the home button that the drone will rise up to ~90ft and then return home. That is done to avoid hitting a low object on returning home. I was glad that Holy Stone supplied extra propellers. Since this mistake I have not had any other issue with this drone. The photos are great where we are now able to see my property from height. This drone is well worth the $300 price. I also purchased extra batteries since the recharge time is pretty long.

title: Works better than any review I read. Very pleased
text: Absolutely great drone. I watched as many videos as I could before purchasing  I drone performs better than any video I saw. As a beginner pilot I did what many do and hit a tree (sadly). That said Jana at Holy Stone customer support was amazing. Helped me with my drone instantly, very kind and professional. I would give 10 stars if I could and will purchase a second drone from them.

title: Good for price
text: Just wish the remote controller was rechargeable as well.

title: It falls down and crashes
text: It broke the first time I used it. Even with half the battery the drone would fall down for no clear reason. Even while trying to take it higher it kept falling down and the third time it came down one of the arms broke. A total disaster. It lasted a grand total of 10min.

title: A great drone & super value!  Very happy with purchase!
text:
After researching and some hesitation, I purchased the HS720 with 4K UHD Camera. And I just took it out this weekend! It was fun, easy and truly enjoyable! I look forward to gaining more experience and testing out all the functions as time goes by.

But as a beginner, I found the HS720 easy to use. From out-of-the-box to the field, it‚Äôs pretty straightforward and nearly intuitive. The case is very nice. I downloaded the app ‚Äì real simple ‚Äì and away I went. No problem!

The remote feels comfortable , the display is easy to read, and the joysticks are easy to use and very responsive. It‚Äôs a small drone (or smaller than I was expecting but, again, this is my 1st drone) but nothing feels cheap; the drone, remote, controls all feel sturdy.

Set up was easy and then the actual flight was a great experience. Fast and fun - flight was easy and responsive. There was a small breeze but, even then, it flew very stable. (But as the winds picked up, I went inside.) It does take time to charge the batteries . . . but, after researching other drones, it doesn‚Äôt seem out of line compared to other brands/models.

While not all functions were tested, this one has just about all one would want/need. Auto land worked well. Follow Me & GPS Return to Home were simple and east to learn.

Again, I wanted a drone for a novice that represented a good investment. Holy Stone has a great reputation . . . this is a very nice drone with lots of excellent features - 4K camera that pivots 90 degrees, quiet brushless motors, easy to use controller, app that is easy to follow. I like products that deliver on their promises and also great value for my money ‚Äì so far, Holy Stone and this drone are all that! I‚Äôm looking forward to more time, testing, and fun!

title: Well made, easy to operate, with the top features desired in an affordable drone.
text: Well made, easy to operate  The Holy Stone HS 720 has all the features you want in an affordable drone: low battery auto-return, gps direct flight, and easy to learn and operate controls.

title: Excellent Customer service!
text: Easy to use product and when is still managed to crash it into a tree and break an arm off, there customer support was on point and very helpful. Replacing and mailing the part free of charge. Highly recommend.

title: Awesome drone!
text: I love this drone. I use it for taking pictures of projects that we do for work as well as initial assessments. This is an excellent drone for the price that it is and I would highly recommend it.

title: Easy to learn
text: It was super easy to learn and impressive performance

title: Easy to fly and loads of fun!
text: Great customer service and a fun little drone! I would highly recommend this drone. It has great features and is easy to learn to fly. Customer service is very responsive and dedicated to taking care of their customers!

title: Great litte Drone
text: Love it works great!

title: Flys itself
text: Went to send it on its first flight, had the 6 gps satellites, and the screen on my phone said good satellite connection. I hit launch and it took off, got about 15 feet up and it went crazy. Flew a few circles then straight into the side of the house at full speed. Customer service said it was my fault because I flew with less then 7 satellites. Would not recommend

title: Super drone..great price, great equipment
text: Wow!  The Holy Stone HS720 folding drone is an amazing piece of equipment.  I have searched for a year seeking to find a drone for my husband to use for surveillance on our farm.  Intensive research finally eliminated all others.  Not only is the drone a value for the money, it is uncomplicated to learn proper handling.  My husband loves it!  And despite a couple of flight errors, it remains undamaged! Great value for the money.....and a great extended flying time!

title: A great drone
text: A great drone. Easy to fly, remote works great and has great range. Picture quality impressive. Very happy with purchase.

title: Excelent quality
text: This is the best gift fast shipping.

title: Poor quality and system .
text: I have a DJI fpv and Mavic pro , I bought the holly stone to see if it‚Äôs nice or not , it‚Äôs a biggest mistake try it , the drone came like used , with scratches and dirty , the blades so bad and it doesn‚Äôt respond very well the command from controller . Not a good drone unfortunately.

title: You are getting a quality drone
text: This is my first drone. Had no problems. Easy setup easy to fly.Had a very good experience.

title: Quanily and Fun
text: I have found Holy Stone drones to be quality made and easy to operate.  I own 3 and wouldn't hesitate to buy another

title: Follow the instructions and you will never lose it.
text: Very simple to fly but is big on features. Have flown it in 21 MPH winds.

title: You get what you paid for!
text:
Got this drone for almost 2 month, and after couple flights these are my experiences:

Operating: pretty easy for everyone even you're new with drone. It has 1 key take off/ landing which make it pretty easy to get started. Their auto return home/ smart GPS return home never worked for me. Even i flew it in good GPS signal zone, as soon as I hit the auto return button it took of the opposite way and I have to manual control to bring it back. Bad hover ability drone keep shaking to both side or till to left or right. Can not fly under breezy condition, even small wind could take it away.

Function: follow me never works whenever I used it the drone turn to a random way and just stand there. Point of interest works good but under perfect weather, as if it breezy a little bit the drone would be carried away off your designated location, and you have to get into the apps to stop the function as I see very annoying. NEVER use follow path, my drone took off immediately as soon as I active it and crashed down.

Video: i doubt their 4K camera advertising, since all video file i took seem very blurry and glitched, even that was the video save on SD cards. Moreover the camera captures a little bit of both propeller on both side, so you really need to edit the video to get a "professional" one.

Connection: the remote controls range pretty good, but not wifi treaming connection from drone to your phone. The phone lost connection with drone as it 100ft away, making video streaming loss as well as your ability to controls it through the camera streaming.

title: Best valued drone for the money
text:
I did a ton of research and the Holystone HD720 is the best valued drone on the market imo. You get GPS, compact and foldable, great remote with screen, brushless motors and a carrying case all for under $300. The DJI Mavic mini looks great but several hundred more and consumer feedback isnt even comparable. I do love how Holystone customer service is the best around. Always friendly, professional and ready to help. Highly recommend and stoked on my new Drone. Thanks Holystone! Highly recommend.

Update: so impressive- flys fast and like a dream. Very well built and top notch quality. Very easy to fly once you get it setup. Return to home is very accurate. I am pleased with camera- its good enough. You also need to ensure you are in slow speed and using a memory card for best results. Keep in mind I paid $250 for this drone on sale and got two batteries with case. Mavic mini is $500 and twice the price. If I was using it to shoot professional photos it would be worth difference but if I had $500 i would just buy two HS720. It has some weight 450 grams so it hovers very well- wind hardly touches it. Very stoked with it. There is a reason this drone has almost 700 reviews on Amazon and Mavic Mini less than 100!

title: Chock full of features and amazing customer service
text:
This is an inexpensive drone for beginners that is chock full of features. 4K adjustable camera, follow me, waypoint and more.
It comes in a nice carrying case and extra blades with two batteries.
The most impressive feature is the amazing customer service. They do not plat the blame game and will do what is needed to make a situation right.

title: Great drone for beginners
text:
I bought this drone for my son who is 12 and is our first outdoors drone. The quality of the build is obvious from the moment you open the cardboard box. The quality of the drone body, the propellers, the motors etc. are excellent. The fact that the arms fold in make the drone very compact when carrying it or not in use. The carrying case is very well designed and you feel that the drone is very secure in the case. Setup and pairing the drone to the controller was a breeze and we were able to complete the setup in less than 10 mins. The first flight was very easy and the return to home feature makes you feel confident of trying out different features. We tried the return to home 4-5 times and every time the drone came to within a foot of where it launched from..The only improvement opportunity that I could see is that the charge time for the battery is close to 7 hours. Understand that the drone uses a lot of power, but the long charge time would make one plan way in advance of actual flying.
We will update the review after we have tried out the " follow me" and "waypoint" feature , but after a day of flying we couldn't have been more pleased.

title: Great customer service
text: The drone is fun to fly and when I had a problem with a crash on third flight, there were no questions ask, they sent me a replacement. The agents on the phone, Cherry and Ley could not have been more helpful. Highly recommend.

title: Don't waste your money
text: Bought this as my first drone. Seemed like a good, user friendly model. When it showed up, it was well built, easy to use, easy to learn how to use and easy to fly. My first few flights, I had in beginner mode, stayed close to home and didn't fly too high. As I got more comfortable, I began flying higher and farther. Everything was going great, until it wasn't. For no reason whatsoever, I lost complete control and the drone flew in a big circle while descending, and crashed into a pond. Customer support was no help. All they did was offer 10% off a new drone. Not just the drone though, I had to buy an entire new kit. They don't sell just the drone. Well, being an idiot, thinking it was fun, and maybe this was just a fluke problem, I bought another one. Same story, flew carefully on nice days, seemed like everything was good, flew up to look at our local water tower (I'm the city water guy) and the drone battery dropped to 2 bars right after I took off, so it tried to return itself to the home position, I had no control, and again, made a big circle while descending, and crashed into the neighbors trees and I am unable to retrieve it. I am absolutely done with Holy Stone. Don't waste your time or money.

title: Very Compact but great videos!
text: I was surprised when I got the box with this drone in it because it is so small. But when you open it up and use it, it is a good size and it produces great videos! It is very quiet and easy to use and maneuver. I would definitely buy it again as a gift to one of my family members or friends (if I'm feeling generous).

title: Great customer service
text: The drone is great, and it is easy to fly.

title: Holy Stone has incredible customer service!
text: I had an issue with the drone on my first flight, it was my first drone, so possible user error, not sure. I contacted Holy Stone and even during COVID pandemic I was replied to in a timely manner. They fixed my issue very quickly and I was back to flying. I'd buy from this company anytime, highly recommended. Thank You Holy Stone.

title: Safety Audits
text: I use m‚Äôy drone for construction site safety audits and it works great

title: Amazing
text: Amazing. Awesome quality and material. Zero problems.

title: Aweskme product
text: 9 year olds birthday gift.  This hs720 is perfect. Forgiving and great. He now has two Holystone drones.

title: Easy to use
text: Flew out to deer feeder in the middle of day to check. Great optics and pics.

title: Great for beginners and intermediate users with powerful features at an affordable price.
text: First time user for a drone of this price range.  I have used a cheaper drone before that belonged to a friend and it was very difficult to fly.  So much I never looked into it anymore.  I decided to on the Holy Stone HS720 because I saw great reviews.  After the very first time use I was able to take it up high and fly around with no issues.  I‚Äôm no expert and was moving it slow but still I got the hang of it quickly.  The features it has are great like return to home, button to auto land, GPS, 2K Camera, follow me, and many more.  One thing I thought could be done better is the remote is not exactly ideal for holding large phones with cases as I struggled a little to make it fit.  Still don‚Äôt think its a deal breaker and I look forward to practice more with it and get better.  Also almost forgot it comes with this very good case to carry it and it all fits in there very well protected.  I have seen other drones don‚Äôt come with something like that and people are having to spend another $50-$90 for a good custom carrying case.  As a beginner and for all the fun I had with it I honestly feel like I‚Äôm flying a $1000 drone and since I‚Äôm not in need of all the other fancy features  I‚Äôm really happy with the decision I made.

title: First timer
text: As first time drone buyer and flyer,  I was surprised how easy this HS720 Drone is to fly.  Instructions were very informative and detailed.  A little disappointed in the limited range, and only 24 mins of flight time, as an extra battery would be great, as time goes by quickly when you're playing.  But an awesome little drone.

title: Incredible
text: I bought this drone as a Christmas present. Two days later December 27 it flew into a tree 45 feet high and stayed there. For months I went back to see if it fell out to no avail. I got a replacement one in March and rarely went back to see if the original one had fallen out. Yesterday August 5th after the hurricane passed, I went to the golf course and found the drone on the ground  It might have been there earlier I don‚Äôt know. But what I do know is that this drone has been out in the elements and all sorts of weather for 7 months and unbelievably still works. It flies and still takes video and pictures as if it was day one. Kudos on workmanship!!

title: Drone ‚Äúhome‚Äù malfunction, denied refund from seller
text: The first time the drone was taken out, everything was going well until the ‚Äúreturn to home‚Äù button was pressed and the drone took off and was never to be found again. I requested a refund, which was initially given. Sent the box back with the remaining parts to only find out 4 months later they charged my account the second time. A second drone was purchased shortly thereafter and it has been working great. All I can say is be prepared to lose your drone and not get your money back for a technical problem.

title: Holy  Stones HD720 worth every penny !!
text:
Another fantastic product form Holy Stone. They really stepped it up. This is a great drone with fantastic features. Holy stone was the first indoor drone I bought and I have bought several others. They never let me down. Great customer support and spares availability( I crash a lot). If this is the future of the company, they are going in the correct direction.
I love the case it comes in. The remote is comfortable in the hands and fits my iPhone 10. The display is easy to read. The joysticks have a great response and feel sturdy. The buttons are layed out well.
This drone has some weight to it. It doesn‚Äôt feel cheap.
After the set up it‚Äôs flight is easy and responsive. It flew very stable in a light wind with minimal drifting. I didn‚Äôt get to test the time in the battery but it was about a 15 min flight with more left to go. Auto land works good. Looking forward to putting it through more testing.

title: Great drone/Awesome customer service
text: For the price I don‚Äôt think you can buy a better drone.  I paid $270 with a coupon on amazon. This drone is a very nice flier, has great power, good handling and can handle somewhat windy conditions.  Lastly holy stone customer service is top notch. June at holystone customer service took care of an issue I had and made sure I was a satisfied customer, best customer service I have seen.

title: New Drone Pilot
text: I've been wanting a drone for a long time and finally took the plunge. I purchased this HS720 and a HS170 at the same time for my first drones. I wanted the HS170 to get the basics of flying a drone before I started to actually fly the HS720. Having both available I could learn a new skill on the little drone then try it on the bigger HS720. This is the way that I learn best and keep it cost effective. Both of these drones are exactly what I needed to get into this hobby. As my skills improve I'm going to be taking the HS720 with me when I go off-roading to plan my route over and around obstacles, view the beauty of the Arizona backcounty and to share the experience with friends and family. The flight controls, ease of use and quality of these two drones are great.

title: Awesome drone, just what I was looking for!
text: I was looking for a good GPS drone that didn't cost an arm and a leg yet had a lot of the features of the more expensive drones.  After driving myself nuts looking at all the options I finally came to the conclusion I was going to purchase from Holy Stone since theirs seemed to be of good quality per user reviews and probably would have better customer support.  Fortunately I went to Holy Stone website and found this new offering from them and I ordered it right away and could not be happier.  I have flown two times now and each time I flew for 15 minutes on the slow speed setting and the battery still had charge left so I think attaining the 22 to 26 min of flying time quoted should not be an issue.  The manual is overall well written and gave me sufficient confidence before my first flight.  One thing I learned which may save people from contacting Holy Stone support is that the bottom lights for the optical sensor will not turn on unless the drone is flying.  The drone handles very well and is able to maintain position even during a slight wind.  By setting limits on distance and elevation in the app I plan to increase the allowable range as my flying skills progress.  I really like that the drone comes with a nice carrying case so I can take it on short hikes and easily pack it without fear of damage.  I have not loaded a memory card yet but the pictures stored back to the phone seem of good resolution and color and it is nice that the camera can angle down so you can get the propellers out of the image. I am very pleased with my purchase and would definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a GPS drone.

title: HS720 is a special product!!
text:
This drone has brightened my grandsons world. He is an autistic teenager with a passion for gadgets. He is passionate about getting his drone license at 16. We had a technical issue with the control of it but customer service was amazing. They jumped right on it and resolved the issue in the blink of an eye. I give them the highest rating for customer service. We will continue to purchase their products in the future. Thanks again.
Pat H. (Cleveland, Ohio)

title: The maiden voyage of my HS 720 and as a novice, my first time operating a GPS drone.
text:
[[VIDEOID:48fcea8b42e9c181c4df6c8ab1cd279b]] After reading several reviews, I decided to buy the HS720 as my first GPS drone because it was loaded with lots of features similar to the more expensive models but is relatively inexpensive. I watched a few online reviews after I bought mine and before it arrived. I immediately charged the battery. Since the weather was bad when it arrived and I had to work, I spent 10 minutes reading through the manual. That was enough for the Holy Stone's maiden flight in our house. I used only the controller unit (no gps and no app) and had it take off, hover, then landed it few times. Given the small space, I ran into some furniture and once into a wall and cringed at the buzzing sounds of propeller blades slapping into them. The bottom line is that it survived the ordeal.

A couple days letter, the weather got better and luckily, my micro SD card and landing pad arrived. I plugged in the card and took my drone outside. I went through the aligning procedure, paired the app with my drone, turned on the video and pressed the take-off button. The process was seamless, taking less that 5 minutes to complete without a hitch. It was so intuitive that I didn't even need to refer to the instructions.

After letting my drone hover for a short time, I rotated it to record the low-altitude view. I then carefully pushed up on the stick to get it maybe 15 feet into the air and made another rotation. Then I went high enough to clear the shorter tress (70 feet according to the flight log) and did one more rotation. Then I hit the automatic return and the drone slowly descended and landed gently on the ground. Everything worked pretty much as I had expected and I am happy with my purchase. Note that the video is better than what you see on this site.

The drone landed about 10 feet from where it took off, which was a bit disappointing (I think we expect too much), and the video quality is not 4K and shaky (see my video), as one would expect from the fact that the camera is not actively stabilized. My conclusion is that it operated as I expected and its shortcomings are reasonable given the price. This is an excellent first drone that I will use to learn the ropes. Once I feel comfortable with it, I plan on purchasing the HS720E so that I can get better videos. For now, I'm looking forward to many hours of learning and fun.

If you are a beginner looking for an excellent gateway drone, I recommend the HS720.

title: Excellent Drone
text: My first drone was a Holystone hs120d great drone, but trying to go for more advanced one so bought the hs720 this drone is amazing. The flying time, distance, and the quality of the camera is excellent. I flew the drone when it was a little windy and not a problem at all. All the features work perfectly like following me, point of interest, return home and tapfly with the maps. I recommend this drone it is really great.

title: My first GPS drone
text: I've had 2 cheap drones and loved flying them.  They lasted until the motors burned out and couldn't be replaced.  This is my first hobby grade drone. It flys well but I don't enjoy having to recalibrate it everytime I want to fly.  As for the different modes, I've only used the auto launch and the return to home button.  The auto launch button usually works but once it went up very quickly until I used the controller.  The return home button worked once, once it returned to hover about 10 feet away then started back up, and the last time it went the wrong way. When the RTH button sent it the wrong way it didn't respond to the controls or the rotor lock, it hit a limb and crashed.  Both of the foldable arms on the left side were broken.  I'm a beginner pilot and I'm happy with the stability, compared to my $50 and $80 drones, but not with the limited use I've gotten from the advanced features this drone offered. Now I need to find out where to buy replacement body parts because Amazon and Holy Stone doesn't list them. UPDATE. -- Holy Stone shipped a full replacement drone and it works great.  This is above and beyond what I expected. The drone is easy to fly and I look forward to learning more about it's abilities.  Thank you

title: Tough as boot leather!
text:
Never owned a drone, but did some research and went with the HS720. Was very happy with the packaging and case. The battery takes 5-7 hours to charge, but hopefully will have at least one spare soon. Took it for the first flight and was pleased with the controls and how it handled in the breeze that is always present at my house. I will say this thing is tough. I had a minor disagreement with a small tree branch but no damage. After taking off again, a HAWK flew out of the woods behind my house and attacked the drone. From about 50‚Äô it hit the ground because I lost control when the hawk made contact with the drone. It landed in the field in front on my house on some rock. I was expecting the worst, but a simple power cycle and recalibration of the compass allowed me to get back in the air and I flew it to the house. Decided not to press my luck on day 1. Definitely recommend this for a beginner.

*Update*
Second flight was great until the battery got low and it went to return to where I took off.... on the other side of my house. I couldn‚Äôt stop it from running in to the side of my house. Now I have two broken drone arms. Will be contacting the manufacturer for replacement parts. I feel the drone should return to the controller. Not to where it initially took off

title: Unpredictable! Can lose connection and crash without warning
text: This seems to fly just fine in perfect conditions within close range. However it consistently loses connection at about 200 - 250 meters, far below it's advertised range. I've also had several instances where it lost connection when it was only 50 meters or so away and instead of it returning to home it went in a completely random direction and I could not control it at all and it crashed from flying sideways at a high speed and I couldn't stop it. If it didn't have these issues it would be great. Unfortunately I have experienced several flaws with this drone and would not recommend it.
