title: Easy To Use - Great Even After Some Crashes
text:
[[VIDEOID:23da3889e7c7498a92a42b2fc422a18e]] Disclaimer; I won this as part of a work contest.
- Overall I am quite happy with this little drone. Being the first drone that I have owned (I've owned RC helicopters before), this was a great experience and has done well for me.
- The ease of being able to pop it up into the air was very nice and made it so I didn't have to worry about stabilizing it too much.
- I LOVE the return to home feature! If I want to get an awesome shot somewhere that can be a bit trick to reach, I can just send the drone off in the distance and let the return to home take over from there to bring it back.
- Also the point-to-point feature is awesome. Just make sure you are above trees/etc so you know it will come back to you.
- One thing I am not a fan of is the follow me function. I went for a hike and it would follow for a moment but then stop. Then it would follow again and stop. This leaves the camera in a bouncing state due to the start/stop action of following me. It is possibly due to the controller beeping at me about low batteries but I don't think that would have impacted it.
- The only other thing that concerns me is that on multiple occasions when I am trying to land it, it will act like it forgot its left/right trim setting and glide away from me. More than once I've had real concerns about hitting people around me as I try to land it.
- I've attached a video of some recorded footage. Not as great as drones costing over a thousand dollars but still some good footage. It can get a bit wobbly if there is wind that the drone is trying to counter but the video works for my purposes.
- I've managed to crash this thing a handful of times and it keeps on working great though. I am very happy with this and would recommend it to others.

text:

I like it. It flies nicely and I figured out the basics of flying somewhat quickly. I probably have an hour total at this time. I had some difficultly with setup, especially the software. The documentation is obviously written in China by someone who is ESL or translated loosely ....

I unboxed and went through the quick setup guide; took me a few tries to figure out the orientation spins and the communication with the controller; and the software remains to be a challenge - again I don't have a lot of time in it yet.

In short, I'd buy again but would like better documentation.

title: Can't get any easier!
text:
I have never owned a drone, never flew a drone but always wanted a drone. I love high tech and photography so what a beautiful match.. I searched and read a lot of reviews and found the Holy Stone HS720 to be the best solution for myself, as a beginner but still wanted a high quality drone.

I don't know how it can be any easier. Again, I have never flown a drone. Changed the battery, installed a Micro-SD card, followed the instructions and watched a Youtube video, and off to the back yard for my 1st flight. It was very simple and a lot of fun. I think the material used on the drone is great. It is very easy to fly, even for the 1st time!

I had a question on the software, so I sent an email to the customer service. The fast response and level of customer service can't be beat!

I think the quality is great, flying can't get any easier! I am looking forward to having a lot of fun with this locally as well as taking great video's and picture at Yosemite park, Hawaii, etc...

I highly recommend this Holy Stone HS720..

Rick Craig

title: A very good drone for the price
text:
After several days of on and off research and debating with my son (who I got this for) we ultimately decided on this model. This appears to be HolyStone's top model and is a very good "bang for the buck".

Observations:
1) This unit has an instruction manual and quickstart guide. I recommend you read both before use.
2) This drone feels heavy considering its size (I mean this in a good way) and is made of high quality impact plastic.
3) It comes with three sets of replacement blades and a decent case, as advertised.
4) The unit folds easily and all the components fit well in the case, which has space for an extra battery.
5) The motors have 4 small slits on the top for heat dissipation and reduce the potential for water and/or dust to get in.
6) It can move very quickly. The 30 MPH speed potential does not appear to be an exaggeration.
7) The battery life on the drone is easy to see both on the back of the drone itself (up to 4 lights on the back of the battery) and the remote.
8) The remote also has a display for its battery life.

What we liked:
1) the interference potential on this drone appears to be low. My son used this drone, which operates on a 2.4GHZ frequency, at the same time two of his friends used other, different, more expensive drones that operate on the same frequency. None of the drones interfered with each other.
2) The battery has a duration that appears to runs as advertised, providing there is no wind.
3) Video quality is good, considering the price point
4) Good safety features: emergency off, variable speed control and "electric fence".
5) The remote allows for accurate control, has an easy to read display and is reasonably easy to use.
6) It's black, which makes it easier to see in daylight while airborne compared to silver, metallic and/or white drone models.

What could use improvement:
1) This drone has to be calibrated every time it is powered on with three horizontal rotations on the ground and three rotations while being held vertical. It would be better if this was not needed except, perhaps, after firmware updates.
2) The remote control unit beeps a lot, which can be annoying and distracting at times. It would be great to have software/firmware updates to control the conditions under which the remote control unit beeps.

This is my son's second drone. The first one we got two years ago (also a Holystone, but priced around $80) decided to fly away on its first use on Christmas day, completely unresponsive to to the remote. We never found it and my son was in tears over the loss, but Amazon did promptly refund the purchase. I was wary of another purchase, but from a lot of reading saw that even the $1000 drones can suffer from this problem and, in any event, this was hasn't (so far) and it does have a built-in GPS.

All things considered, based on what I've seen so far, my son and I are happy with this purchase.

title: Easy drone to use and worth the price
text:
The HS720 is awesome - its built well and strong. Its very compact and comes with a great hard shell case for portability. Pairing and calibration was pretty quick. The controls are very good and drone very responsive. Camera / video quality is pretty decent as well. My kids were able to use the drone pretty easily too after about 10 minutes of flying.
I would advise doing all of the experimenting outside the house where you more room to fly around and learn the dos and don'ts of flying a drone.

title: This drone will have you flying in no time.
text:
I'm a first time drone buyer and user with no previous experience, so I don't have anything to compare to it. Except when I ordered the 720 I did read up and got advice saying that I should practice with a cheaper model that I would not be as afraid to risk breaking. So I bought a Bolt Bee HS150 and flew it first a little, before the HS720. That's the extent of experience I have to go on.

I'm thoroughly impressed with the 720 and its handling capabilities! It was easy to setup. I even used it to look in my tree for my wayward Bolt Bee, which had "raced" it's way previously into the tree (not till after I bought it did I learn that the HS150 is considered not only a beginner's drone, but also a racing drone, being very fast indeed, lol).

On my first day out flying the 720 I was able to record some short videos and pictures with the drone. I even posted a short video on Facebook, and it got liked, too!

I'm having a lot of fun with this unit. I can wholeheartedly recommend this drone. I'll be glad when I get another battery so I can fly longer, as the recharge time on these batteries pretty much ends the days fun. That's the only weakness I found in the HS720.
The whole thing stores in a compact case that comes with it. A totally cool bonus! For anyone thinking about trying drones, this is a great one to start out with.

title: Holy Stone HS720 rocks!!
text:
Holy Stone HS720.
I have experience with RC aircraft and decided to add a drone to my inventory because the price was unbeatable.
Purchase, shipping, packaging and unboxing were as expected... Amazon perfect üôÇ
Decided to use only the "quick start" guide for prep and first flight to see how good the instructions are.
Took it out on a windy day, followed the instructions and easily achieved a solid hover and then played with the camera.
Shot video and still images without having to work too hard with the wind.
I am not certain how this would be for someone with zero experience...maybe learn on something very inexpensive? For me, no regrets at all on this purchase. Solid product and unbeatable price point... Came with spare blades and a great case too!!!

title: Very Impressive Drone Package!
text: I bought this drone for my 6yo son and myself to learn and use together. We are very impressed with all aspects of this setup. Very well built drone, controller, and carrying case. I was skeptical about the folding feature, but super pleased now that I see how well executed it is. Its a substantial drone when opened but folds down to a very compact unit and fits in the very rugged and handy case. This is a unit my family will actually want to take with us places because it is so portable and highly functional. The video recording is very respectable, we have already gotten alot of great footage and obviously so much potential for great projects. The controls and phone based UI also are very straight forward and so far perfectly reliable. It's is all around sweet. My son is a bright and science minded 6 yo, and while I'm not letting him use it by himself, he totally could if I allowed. It's pretty easy with minimal steps to set up and use. Oh and the battery legitimately lasts the stated 26 minutes or more. We have flown it for 25 minutes straight and it still showed 1/3 battery remaining.

title: Great Custy Support, Good Drone
text:
Had issues with my first HS720 and they were shockingly responsive about it. Seriously, it a fantastic level of customer service albeit a little clunky. However, when I was having issues with controls for my drone they were quick to recommend another controller app. The drone captures nice pictures but stability and pitch can be a bitch at times. Which I am hoping I can hammer out with more flight time.

All in all, I would recommend this for those just past their beginner stage of drone flight time. Solid drone but you gotta work with a few rough edges. With the stellar customer support I'd give this drone a 'B' all in all.

title: Great drone for beginners
text: I would like to say that this is my very first drone. So easy to fly great for beginners I had it open going in no time and I love the controller if it's my hands just right and I love having the ability of being able to use my phone when flying I would recommend drone to anyone who is a beginner

title: Easy to set up and operate.
text:
Great little drone for taking pictures. I have managed to get some great pictures and videos with this drone. It was quick to set up and get in the air. I only had issues with the phone I was using. I could not get video from the drone to come up on my phone. I am using a Motorola 5G plus phone. It seems I had the wrong app loaded (you need Ophelia GO and not Ophelia GPS for the holy stone HS 720. And also, you must have the phone in airplane mode for the video down link to work. All in all this drone works great now! Also, their customer support is very good. I called a couple times while trying to get the video to work on my phone and the person I talked to was very helpful and got me going in the right direction.

title: Drone flew off and disappeared.
text:
Update 6/10/20
So I was able to contact holystone. Their customer service was awesome. After telling them my story, they decided to send me a whole setup again. Which was awesome. I was really surprised by that. So it‚Äôs supposed to arrive Friday.
I did in the meantime have my dad come over to help me search for my drone. Miraculously my dad found it somehow today. It was laying in the field next to my field near the fence row. It was laying upside down and the top shell was cracked. I was able to turn it on and then it turned right back off. So something Is wrong With it internally. Contacted holystone again to see what they want to do work the damaged drone. Not sure if they will want it back so they can perform an analysis on it to see what happened. I would buy this drone again solely based on the customer service. I think going forward before she flys again, I‚Äôm going to invest in a fpv camera and goggles. That way if it goes down again I will be able to locate it based on the area I‚Äôm flying again.plus you can record with most fpv goggles. The built in wireless fpv for your drone is not that great. I‚Äôve only been able to get it out to 250 meters or so with no obstructions. I mean it‚Äôs not bad. But the drone controller has the capability to reach 1000 meters. I wished this was one was built more likely the DJI drones to where the app/phone connects to the controller instead of the camera on the drone. If it were to send the signal to the controller and then to the app, you could fly out further. I‚Äôve seen most of the DJI drones fpv on app can reach 1km and the controller itself is 2km. The other thing I wished holystone would do is to have a internal gps locator built in to it in case it crashed you could locate it. That or add in a crash detection system to the drone such as a loud beeping sound or flashing lights to help locate it. Other than that, I would recommend this drone and that‚Äôs why i am rating it to 5 stars now based on their great customer service.

6/6/20
I will write a updated review on this once I hear back from holystone.

But for now giving it one star. Drone was nicely packaged. Charged the battery and setup it up on a Thursday. Was able to fly it Thursday and Friday.no problems. I‚Äôm writing this today as it‚Äôs Saturday. The third day took it out on a flight. Got some nice video of some cows. Brought it back home after about 10 mins of Flight time. . Then took it back up for some more Arial shots. Got it out to 251 meters in my field and then my app lost connection and I lost video. No trees. It‚Äôs a wide open field. Then all of a sudden the controller started beeping and haven‚Äôt seen it since. I selected the return to home feature. It never came back. I have no idea what happened. Not sure if Jesus took it home with him or what. I‚Äôm going to do some more searching tomorrow. It sucks that this drone with all its features doesn‚Äôt have a locator on it. The app was no help as it didn‚Äôt even record my last flight. I‚Äôve email holystone to see what they can do. Hopefully their customer support will Help me Out with a refund or a replacement.

title: Spend more buy better one!!!

title: Review with updates!
text:
Update 2: Works flawlessly with the new Iphone 11 Pro Max! Phone fits in holder and connection is very strong!
Update1: A few weeks in this thing rocks! The flight times are awesome, very easy controls, and everything just works! So far this is a review of the unboxing and my initial impressions of this value priced drone.
The first thing I noticed is that everything is well packaged in very professional packaging. I would have no problem presenting this as a gift.
Heft and build quality of the drone itself is great! Slightly less robust than DJI, but only just barely. This thing does not feel inexpensive at all!
Instructions are my final point of consideration. The instruction books are a little small but they are overall complete and very straightforward! Pictures are included as needed and I will definitely have no problem ingesting all the flight ‚Äùhow-to‚Äôs‚Äù of this drone.
This about wraps it.up for my initial impressions, my only real complaint (which is barely a complaint) is that no wall plug was included for charging the batteries. I say this isn't a real complaint as who doesn't have about a million of these things laying around anyway?
Stay tunes as I add updates to cover initial flight and video impressions!

title: Great flying time
text: Having previously bought a beginners drone from Holy Stone, I was excited to get the HS720 to expand my experience with added capabilities and flying time.  Their products are very well made and I was not disappointed with the HS720.  With 25+ minutes of operating time and brushless motors, it‚Äôs great to be able to fly without the worry of the battery draining quickly and ending the fun prematurely.  I‚Äôve tried almost all of the features and have found it very easy to operate and control.  I‚Äôd highly recommend the HS720 to anyone wanting to step up their game.

title: Fantastic unit for the money
text: Super easy to fly for a beginner like me and the camera is pretty good as well. I bought this unit for the modest entry price in relation to the features, in case I messed it up, but it can just about fly itself. I can see flying it for a while now that I have used it, descent range, camera, really easy to fly if you glance at the manual, and lots of fun as well.

title: False Advertisement
text: I buy so much product from Amazon, I would never have the time to review them all but this time I have no choice. This mistake is so egregious and it is the sole reason I made this purchase. They advertised flight time as 52 minutes but on the box it clearly say 26 minutes flight time. No need for me to even open the box. 26 minutes is not enough flight time for the price.

title: Is so easy to operate, there is so much joy it's overwhelmingly worthy!
text: [[VIDEOID:685fe8e37f71c5c3e705a4bbb833be6a]] This was the moment I waited for, the drone's battery was charged and I did everything as told in the instructions. I was so excited, it was my first time flying a drone. Yes as you read. It is my first time, I'm a rookie on drones and I couldn't mess up because I practically live under high power lines. I read the instructions but I felt as if it should be more to know, It can't be that easy, can it? I was so excited but nervous too. I got brave and said to myself, "this is it! Go for it!" As I hit the quick take off button and there it was, hoovering right in front of my eyes, so smooth, so steady and solid I've tried to pull it away from it's set spot and it fought me hard returning to the spot he was. I played with it, I was so happy with it. The GPS was on and I was able to see that there were 12 satellites above me. It was so easy to fly, I wasn't afraid anymore and I was having fun enjoying the drone time flew buy so quick before I knew the battery was low. Get the second, third or fourth battery if you can afford it cause you are going to want to stay up there with it. It is easy to learn, easy enough for beginners like me and I'm an old beginner. The remote control with my cell attach makes it so easy to control and the view on the screen from the 4k camera is unbelievable. I'm so glad I bought it. I had no accidents, I felt under control. I took it far away, high up and back down. Sorry I posted onlya short part of the movie but I was having trouble uploading the video. Something with my cell data provider not the drone. All I can say is and I quote: I love it, I love everything about my Holy Stone HS720.

title: Great drone.

title: This drone is dangerous!
text:
Got this drone for fathers day, and attempted to fly it for the first time today. After initial power-up, finished geocalibration, and made sure that enough GPS satellites are in view. Pressed the hover button, and the drone started to take off, first slowly, then without any input from the remote, took off and flew away. It first hit the roof of my house about 20m away, and I thought surely the motors will shut off... nope, it kept going! I frantically searched for an emergency stop, which even my ancient AR.Drone had... nada. Pressing landing, nothing. The drone keeps going and rising! So I shut off the remote, and drone keeps going, eventually hitting a tree and fortunately getting stuck, because the rotors kept just going in the tree!

Needless to say, I am glad no kids or other people/animals were around, as this could have been seriously dangerous. This drone gets returned ASAP and I will stay far away from them!

ps: look at other 1-star reviews that had the exact same experience!

title: Easy to operate
text:
I'm being very careful while learning in a open area, but I'm having the time of my life.

Highlights:
I bought 2 HS720 and received June 19, 2020 and sent the second to my friend.
Drone Flights by a beginner
1 - About 15 min of flight hovering and testing the return to home, and it worked Great!!
2 - About 20 min flight and I got the camera to work with the controller. What Great Photo's & Videos. I was overwhelmed by the quality of Camera!!!! Then Return to Home
3 - About 20 min flight and felt very comfortable with moving it around my house and yard. More Great Photo's!!!!!!
4 - About 15 min flight walking around my yard to follow the Drone, Showed my neighbor, He was very impressed with the photo's. He is going to order one. I told him that Holy Stone is a Great customer Service Company. He also was super impressed with the Return to Home Button.
5 - About 10 min flight showing my wife how easy it was to fly. She also controlled it, but didn't go very far, a little nervous but was shocked with the return to home button worked.
6 - My friend, that I bought the second HS720 for stopped over and he watched me fly mine for about 15 min.
He was very impressed and couldn't wait to charge his battery and test

title: $299 flew away
text:
I took this drone to Hawaii with me. I used the follow-me features and it worked fine until It lost signal with my phone.
It kept trying to return to the position that it took off from. when I cancel the follow-me it would not come to me with the controls. I had to land it then walk 50 yards to get it. I was afraid it would go out over the ocean and not come back.
On 11 January 2020 I was flying it in my back yard and I tried using the Way points and it flew off and lost all signals
and never returned. Holy Stone need to improve their wifi and GPS.

title: Super Solid
text: Solid product and good value. I would definitely recommend for beginners.

title: I love it great pictures and videos
text: When I messed up my drone this company went above and beyond helping me fix it I would recommend there products to any one cant wait to up grade my drone!

title: Fantastic customer service!!!
text: This was my first ‚Äúnon toy‚Äù quadcopter and I am very happy with it. Easy to manage and fly. Battery life keeps it in the air for 15-20 minutes easily under most conditions. Camera has good quality. I wish it could have obstacle avoidance but not a big deal. Had an issue with camera became ‚Äújittery‚Äù after some time. I couldn‚Äôt find a parts page from website and reached out via email and customer service was fantastic!!! A few email exchanges and they sent replacement, under warranty, without me asking. Because of this great customer service, I went and purchased another one of their small quadcopters to play around with inside the home during winter.

title: Worth every penny!
text: This is the 4th drone I've owned, and my favorite so far. Make no mistake: this is not the equal of the Mavic line, or other high priced machines. BUT, it is worth every penny spent on it. The controls are responsive, the drone handles easily, and it's even survived two minor crashes in the few months I've owned it. My only real complaint is that the battery does not latch onto the charger in any way, making it difficult to charge, especially in a moving vehicle.

title: Large strong drone.
text: Well built and Handles better than most of the other similar class drones I've flown. GPS holds well and the return to home is great. Flies for along time with the addition of the extra battery. Strong motors think I can lift my kid with it. Full sized drone not for indoor use. I also like that its compatible with almost all phones not just new Iphone's. You don't have to buy a new phone just to go fly. The App is easy to use with key features readily available. The Follow Me Mode is very cool to use. Comes in a very nice case witch makes carrying the drone around a snap. And last but most certainly not least the customer service you receive with this company is second to none.

Have had hours of flight time with spectacular videos, mostly flying in marginal conditions (cold, high altitude). It is a good value and the Holy Stone people are always responsive to questions and suggestions.

title: awesome drone
text: I loved the extended flight time, and the fact the drone was easy to learn to fly right out of the box. definitely will order from them again.

title: Great Drone, customer service and a deal
text: Epic drone. Super sturdy and easy to fly. All features work great and return to home key is awesome and accurate. Only problem is figuring out the camera and how to see pics etc. if you use the screen on your phone for videos and pics you can view them by pressing the play button and transfer them. I use iMovie and it works just fine. Customer service is fantastic. Has a ceiling of 900+meters and top speed 44mph. That‚Äôs why return to home is amazing cause I lost it the other day in the blue sky. Great Dtone. Get one and a spare battery. 23-26 mins is great but almost 60 is better! Don‚Äôt forget to get yourself registered with the FAA for any drone over .55lbs. Your call though

title: Packed with features
text: Great drone packed with solid features for the price point.

title: Great but for price
text: Had previously had a cheap 20 dollar target drone I loved.  Received the holy stone 120d for x mas.  Less then a month later I order this drone.  First impression was wow!!! Have the 2k video version but abesolutely love this drone.  Came with nice carrying case, a battery an double charger.  Video with this review was done a few weeks ago.  I received this January 25 an have probably a 100 flights one this drone.  Average flight time is 23-26 minutes with calibration included, an also taking videos an pictures whole time. Info on the video. High wifi interference area, an still kept fpv on cell phone till around 320 ish meters.  Flight h3ight was around 100 meters, an maxed out at 809 meters distance..... I lost sight of the drone an hit the return to home function.  Only thing I can say is follow manual an do all set up an make sure your on level ground with minimal 12 satellites connected before lift off, an this drone will return to within 6" of take off every time

text: I've never been a drone "person " but after my son flew his uncles he was a natural and I knew he needed to have one. Shopped around a while and decided on the Holystone.  It's a great drone with all the bells and whistles of a drone that would cost 2x this price. We are loving it so far. We go out every evening and try to get some good sunset photos.  Once you get the hang of it, pretty easy operation! But as  a novice drone operator, we did have a learning curve.

title: fun drone

title: Satisfactory
text: The drone is easy enough to use for a beginner, seems quality, and the case is great. There could be more compatible accessories but overall a good purchase.

title: Great Drone
text: Easy to use and not hard to learn to fly. Really cool drone.

title: A Great Unit!
text:
I received this HS720 as a gift. It took me a while to get started with it because the weather conditions wouldn't cooperate - windy, snow on the ground, etc.
When I finally got at it seriously, I had a problem getting the camera feed to show on my cell phone. I emailed Holy Stone Customer Support and the service was amazing! They replied within a day and stayed with me until the issue was resolved. (BTW: make sure you don't have a WiFi switching app active. It might cause you to lose the connection between the drone camera and your phone.)
Using the HS720 is quite intuitive, once you have studied, and followed, the instructions. The response to the controls is very good, as is the picture quality.
I have not yet tried all the features, but am impressed with the Return to Home function. Wherever the drone is when you push that button it immediately climbs to 100ft+ in order to clear trees, etc (scary the first time it happens!), then positions itself over the Home spot and slowly descends to land at the place from which it took off.
In addition, the unit is quite robust. I have accidentally crashed it into a bird feeder, a tree and some rocks in our landscaping and the unit came out fine.
I would highly recommend the HS720.

title: Doesn't hold an s22 ultra in the case very well.
text: Doesn't seem as stable as a DJI mini, but was pretty simple to get it going. Only a few runs so far though.

title: Camera and durability is not good
text: The camera leaves a lot to be desired. We got it stuck in a tree 10 feet off the ground and the arm broke immediately trying to get it out. The wind completely took control it and it could not readjust. Very dissatisfied for a beginner drone as it‚Äôs very fragile.

title: Great First Drone!
text: This is my first drone and the HS720 is exactly what I needed. Enjoy flying it both in and outdoors. Very easy interface and great for my beginner status. Very pleased!

text: Customer Service for Holy Stone is Top Notch,  we had some difficulties with the Home Button and they were Fatastic.  The Holy Stone Drone is well made top notch all the way

title: Excellent fit and finish.  Easy to operate.
text: I just received my new HS720 yesterday.  I charged the battery and then anxiously executed my inaugural flight this morning.  The drone/remote was easy to link and to calibrate the compass.  The micro SD card slot makes downloading nice and convenient.  I noticed how well made the drone is once I got my hands on it.  The fit and finish is very nice.  I am a beginner and this is easy to use impressive.

title: Not happy it broke First flight
text: It wouldn't stay in one place.

title: Glad I didn't spend less
text: I think this drone is a good starter drone for someone interested in learning drone photography or an adult starting to fly drones. I think the camera is adequate and the controls are responsive. I am glad I did not buy a cheaper drone with a lower resolution camera. The drone has decent range and stays connected to the phone at a good distance. Interference does play a major role in the distance the drone can go from you. I have been happy with my purchase so far and look forward to learning more of the features of this drone. I want to take great photos in the future so I will be upgrading to a DJI in the future.

title: Great flyer and easy to carry with you.
text: Great drone. Have several Holystone drones of various sizes, this one has become my favorite. The included carrying case is a big plus. Very stable flight and it‚Äôs fast. One of my favorite features is the dual LED bottom landing lights. The control app is the same as the HS700D so the phone icons at the top of the phone screen are a little small, maybe a HS720 specific app is coming soon. Great flyer and easy to carry with you.

title: Excellent quality

title: Excellent product l, ready to use out of the box.

title: A great starter drone
text: This is my first drone purchase.  I read up on various types of drones and decided to get one that right on the edge between a low-end toy drone and a more expensive serious drone.  The performance has been good.  My sons and I have taken the drone out and flown it several times and got some good aerial footage of our neighborhood.  While I would not recommend this drone for a serious professional, it's a great drone for a hobbyist or someone new to flying drones.  Once I have mastered this one, I may get a higher-end drone.

title: Internal gimbal does not work.
text: The internal gimbal did not work on 2 of my purchases. It took off at an angle hitting the props every time. Also with 18 satellites would not land with the home signal. I am not sure if it was effected by electrical wire interference but did not work in my area. Would not purchase again.

title: Holy Stone 720 Drone Review
text:
Personal or hobby use. Got it up and running quickly. This drone was for my 16 year old. He's just overjoyed about it since his last drone some years ago was just a toy piece of junk. This is stable and what an enjoyable experience.

text: Got this for my father for father's day and has been amazing, battery life is long, it is very stable and very durable, controls were easy to learn, and very fast. title: Go ahead and buy this!
text:
This was my first drone, so I was obviously nervous when it was delivered. Charging the batteries took FAR longer than expected. And when I was finally able and ready to go have some fun with it ... it just DID NOT WORK!!! For whatever reason, the darn thing wouldn't take off properly. It ate all four propellers, and damaged the replacements included in the package.
But you want to know what's truly great?
Holy Stone recommended I contact Amazon, which issued a replacement no questions asked (well, just a few questions... but you get the point). The replacement arrived within a few days, and it's AWESOME! I spent maybe 1-2 hrs in an open field getting acquainted with the controls, and after that I was flying like I'd been doing it for years.
If you never had a drone before, this thing is definitely for you. Go ahead and buy it.
Just one suggestion. Make sure you practice over an uninhabited area for as long as it takes to feel comfortable. The first fly will send your heart racing, because you truly have no idea what you're doing! Stick with it. You'll see that the controls are intuitive, and you'll feel at ease in no time.

title: Awesome Drone!!
text: I can't believe how awesome this drone is for the price.  I was looking at very expensive drones, but someone pointed out the Holy Stone HS720 to me.  I purchased it, and I was afraid to fly it at first, but it works just as it should, everything works as advertised.  I practiced inside for a while, because I was afraid of what the wind might do to it.  The first time I took it out, the wind was about 12mph or more, but this drone held its position rock solid!! I would recommend this drone for anyone, beginners or advanced drone pilots.  Holy Stone is awesome!!

I waited maybe 2 minutes. Dennis immediately knew my problem and resolved it. I haven't got to push the battery and time it but the video is really nice.

text:

Make sure you use the memory card, the video feed that streams to your phone isn‚Äôt 4K and only meant to direct the drone. The quality of the photos and videos saved to memory card is 4K & amazing.

It‚Äôs also super fast, and the return to home feature works better than I ever thought it could, I was highly impressed.

It‚Äôs an all around Fantastic drone that I couldn‚Äôt be happy with!

My first flight was successful and I used the orbit feature while shooting video, then return home from about 100‚Äô up. It landed within about a foot of the takeoff spot. I used the gps feature as well and that‚Äôs handy. Very well made a great value considering the features and 4K video quality!

title: This company stands behind their products....
text: So I bought the HS 720 foldable drone. It arrived a day earlier then promised. After watching a start up video a few times I was up and flying using the app. The video was ridiculously clear and stable in moderate wind. While flying the drone the wind picked up and my drone landed on a low roof and lid down to a bush. I retrieved the drone and after changing the blades it wouldn‚Äôt fly. It would take off and crash. I contacted customer service and the wonderful lady walked me through several steps and the drone didn‚Äôt operate correctly. I sent them a video that they requested and three days later my new drone arrived.... The customer service with this company and the knowledge of their product is exceptional... I will be purchasing a drone for my eight year old son and it will be a holy stone and mainly because of this experience....

title: Nice product! Easy setup for a rookie like myself!

title: Very easy to fly, smooth controls, amazing camera
text:
[[VIDEOID:b15c3a3d2fe663a3f00effdef9bb3231]] My wife bought me the HS720 drone for my birthday and I was as excited as a little kid on Christmas. Not bad for a 40+ year old man. I have owned lesser expensive "toy" drones before, but they typically did not last more than a day or two before breaking. My first impression was the great packaging with the compact design, carrying case, and step-by-step setup instructions.
I have only flown this drone about 5 times, twice outdoors and three times inside a large warehouse. (it was raining and I really wanted to fly). The features of the Ophelia app and the functionality is top notch.
Today I flew it around my pool in a steady wind with occasional gusts and could not believe how incredibly stable this thing is. If your hands get tired, you can let go of the controls and the drone just hovers until you take control again. The image stability is pretty good, but there is occasional lag if you move the drone too fast (panning shots), and when the battery gets low, the video can become a little pixelated, but it is not bad. Speaking of low battery, the return to home function if you batteries get low is fantastic! The one-touch take off and landing functions are equally nice and take some of the risk out of crashing. I tested the return to home feature today and took the drone about 150 feet up and over my neighbors house (vacant at the moment), pressed the return to home button on the app control and the drone landed within about 8 inches of where it took off. The battery life is pretty close to advertised, but again, i was fighting wind, and taking the drone on high speed fly-by's to hone my skills and test the functions of the drone, so I got just shy of 20 minutes flight time on a full charge.

In short, I would absolutely recommend this to anyone wanting to get an easy to fly, and user friendly drone.

title: Great drone from a great company!!!
text: The drone is easy to learn and use. The instructions are clear and the system works well especially at its price point. Additionally, Holy Stone has great customer service! They are very friendly and answered the phone immediately when I called with questions. I would definitely recommend this company and product to a family member or friend!

title: Wow! What a beauty of a palm drone.
text:
I did a great deal of research before purchasing this drone. For the price, the look, the picture, the stability. You can't go wrong with the HS720. The case it comes in completes it. The setup and instructions are clear along with it being well packaged. Was worried my Iphone 8+ wouldn't fit. Wrong. It fit perfectly in the pull up cradle. What a picture. I must be doing something right because there is no jello in the image. No it's not me it's the drone. After charging to make sure it was at full capacity, I watched the clock and sure enough, I got plenty of time to fly. Once you start flying you want more juice. Hope they come out with a way to purchase more batteries. Surprise is that the charger can charge 2 at the same time. Most of my time was making sure it all checked out. Gps lock was good and with a light wind it still took some great video and pics.

I'm looking forward to getting some good footage of the Idaho mountains with this beauty. No regrets. Worth every penny!

title: really great drone  -  but!
text: My experience with this drone has been really great except for one issue.  On several occasions it has gone completely ROUGE right after take off.  What I mean by that is that right after take off, the machine does not respond to the controller, and flies off in unpredictable directions that always end with a crash.  Initially I thought that was due to not having good contact with enough gps satellites.  I no longer believe that is the case, and I am not sure why this is happening.  But it has survived all of these crashes, even though some of them where pretty hard.  Absolutely no negative issues other than that, and it has performed really well and taken great pics.  I ordered a second battery which arrived on time, and if I can solve the ROUGE ISSUE, the Hollystone hs 720 will get 5 stars across the board from me.

title: Slick, economical hobby drone!
text:
With a special offer, I got this as a replacement for another Holy Stone, HS120D, which is also a nice drone. But for not much more $$, the HS720 4K is a HUGE upgrade! Part of that is the 4K itself, but in general it‚Äôs a great UAV. It handles very smoothly, has pretty long flight times on a single charge (an actual 30 minutes, as opposed to a ‚Äútheoretical‚Äù 30 minutes), and maintains a strong, reasonable distance range connection to the controller and phone app (my prior economy drones did not). Though not connected via a gimbal, the camera has nice, smooth range of motion with all but if not complete 0-90 degree adjustment angle. The ‚Äúleast convenient‚Äù aspect is that the drone rests flat on the ground (as many folding drones do, of course), not ideal for anything other than flat pavement or a landing pad; however, for little expense, you can add bottom clip-on landing gear to compensate for that. Lastly, the controller, relatively simple and compact yet very functional and easy to use, has an added feature (again, different from the previous economy drones I‚Äôve had) of a LCD display of the drone‚Äôs status: height and distance, # of gps satellites in range, battery level, and more.

All around, a nice, reliable and fun device for those not ready yet to invest in a DJI!!

title: Very easy to fly, even for newbies like me!
text:
The drone is extremely easy to use. There are a bunch of videos on Youtube explaining how to use it. Using it through the controller or through the cellphone (if you download their app) is also quite simple. If you are a beginner, I would start with something like it since you will eventually crash, before going for something more expensive.
After a while, I had a problem with my controller and contacted Holy Stone's customer service. They had a WhatsApp customer service that was quite efficient and ended up replacing my controller. So I'm really happy with it. Buying on Amazon gives you these kinds of perks in case you need assistance.

title: Drone has many nice feature and good customer support
text: This drone has a lot of great features include a high-resolution camera and the ability to use GPS receivers.  While I am pretty competent at using computers and other technology, I am a novice drone operator. It took me a while to get the drone set up, partly because the indicator lights are on the bottom of the drone arms, and so you can only see their reflection from above.  I initially had some difficulty in getting the WiFi connection between my phone and the drone, but once it was connected, it seemed fairly stable.  At this point, I am still evaluating the "Return to Home" function.  This function is supposed to return the drone to its starting point. However, my one attempt to evaluate this function resulted in the drone flying way off course at high speed and crashing into a tree, thereby breaking one of the drone arms.  Fortunately, the Holy Stone customer support has been excellent, and they are sending me a replacement arm for free withing the next 3-4 weeks.  Once I can repair the drone using their instructional video, I hope to be able to provide a fuller review.

title: Frustrated with Short Battery Life on Drone Purchase
text:
I recently purchased a drone from this company, excited to explore the world of beginner aerial photography. However, my experience has been marred by the disappointingly short battery life of the drone.

The advertised specifications boasted a decent flight time, but in reality, the drone barely lasts a few minutes before requiring a recharge. This severely limits the potential of capturing captivating footage or enjoying extended flight sessions, I expected at least 20-25 min PER BATTERY, however, it does not even give me enough time to drive out somewhere and use it. It feels like a constant race against time, constantly swapping batteries and missing out on valuable moments.

I have taken utmost care to ensure proper charging and followed all recommended practices to maximize battery life. Despite these efforts and despite the fact that this started happening as soon as the first use after a 5 Hr initial charging session! The drone's battery performance falls far short of expectations. It is frustrating to invest in a product that promises versatility and endurance, only to be hindered by its limited power supply. I should‚Äôve bought the 40$ one.

Furthermore, when I reached out to to express my concerns, the customer service response was unsatisfactory. Based on my research and conversations with other drone owners, this level of performance is far from acceptable.

As a consumer, I expect the products I purchase to deliver on their advertised features. A drone with such a short battery life severely hampers its usability and diminishes the overall experience. It is disheartening to have my enthusiasm dampened by this flaw, which should have been addressed during the design and testing stages.

I hope that this seller takes this feedback seriously and strives to rectify this issue. Potential customers should be aware of the drone's limited battery life and consider alternative options that offer longer flight times. For those seeking a reliable and enduring drone experience, I would advise looking elsewhere until this seller addresses this significant drawback.

title: HS720 makes rookie look like a pro!
text: Maiden voyage was unbelievably awesome!  Easy to fly right out of the box.  (My first time ever flying a drone!)  Camera quality is not professional grade, but that was to be expected with a sub-$300 GPS drone.  Easy to use; would recommend for adult beginners for sure!  Flight time as advertised.  Included travel case is great.  Ready to get back out there as soon as battery is charged!!

title: Finally a portable drone with carrying case
text: I have been pretty impressed with the HS720D.  Its quick ‚Äì responsive ‚Äì portable ‚Äì and finally a holy drone that comes with at freaking portable case!  The controller runs off regular ole AA‚Äôs; and the battery charges in a little portable cradle instead of micro USB like some of the older Holy Stone Drones. The camera is built into the nose of this model ‚Äì so you do see the props in the picture when at zero degree.  One little nuisance I‚Äôve notice is that my camera will get a ‚Äúwavey‚Äù affect to the video every so often.  It‚Äôs almost like it‚Äôs getting some air turbulence off the props.  It doesn‚Äôt do it all the time ‚Äì but it is noticeable when it does.  The LED‚Äôs are the standard red / green configuration and tucked nicely into the folding arms.  They are not as easy to see from a distance ‚Äì but there is a bright white light on the bottom that can be turned on and off that is very easy to see.  The distance on the  HS720 is impressive ‚Äì even in wifi congested suburbia.  And when you take it out to the country ‚Äì you can easily get 500 foot altitude.  One concern I do have is I have noticed some wearing in the wire boots at the pivot points of the folding arms ‚Äì the wire itself is fine ‚Äì but the boot is definitely showing wear after just a handful of uses.  This is actually my 2nd HS720 ‚Äì as I had issues with the initial one ‚Äì but Holy Stone customer support stepped up and immediately took care of the issues for me.  The controller is a bit compact for my taste ‚Äì but the feedback on the LCD display is great.  Its nice to have all the information regarding battery ; signal strength; distance and such all right in front of you in a nice clean display.

title: Great Photos from the Holy Stone HS720
text:
Bought this for my wife for Christmas. Weather and life got in the way, and we're just now getting to use it. It has a small learning curve, but it is really easy for a first timer to use. It takes great pictures, and has a zoom. You can tilt the angle of the camera down, so you can eliminate the propellers showing up in videos. The only thing I don't like is the charge time on the battery--at least 6 hours. I bought an extra battery, but even at that you get about an hour combined and then you're done for 12 hours. Extra batteries is a must. Great little unit.
April 2022 update: Unit began not responding unexpectedly. I contacted Customer Service inquiring about a "reset" procedure--it was just "locked-up" best I could tell. There isn't a reset. They told me that based on the symptoms, it was a motherboard failure. They sent me a new drone. I had to send in mine for autopsy. Great Folks!

title: Good / ok Drone
text:
My first thought on my first flight was good. It seemed easy to control. The camera looked pretty decent. The more I got used to the control I took it a little higher and a bit farther. The furthest I took it was about 30 yards out and about 80ft high. I wanted to test the return to home function. Right before I pressed the button i tried to rotate it a bit to take 1 last photo before returning home. When I did that it did a barrel roll and kept flipping til it hit the deck. lucky for me I was able to retrieve it. If I was out somewhere else it would have been lost. And fortunately, nothing broke. For what it is and the price I think it's very decent. However, at this point I am very hesitant to test it's limits or let it explore further. I'm in between 3.5 and 4 stars. 3 because of what it did so the trust or reliability. 4/4.5 because I think it's well built and the camera was pretty good.

Update: I flew it a couple more time with only 1 minor hiccup. Other than that experience have been quite positive. Customer service has been great as well!

title: Phenomenal Drone and amazing customer service
text:
First, this drone is GREAT! It is heavy enough to fly through the wind, but light enough to avoid damaging itself if you accidentally crash it. Of all the drones i‚Äôve flown, the responsiveness of this is the thing that really stands out. There is zero delay between your inputs and the drone‚Äôs reaction‚Ä¶essentially throughout its entire range. Also, the battery life is far superior to even $1,000+ drones from other brands. 26 min per battery is the best i‚Äôve ever seen. I totally love this thing.

There are tons of other features i like, but the real reason i‚Äôm writing this review is that i‚Äôve been blown away by Holy Stone‚Äôs customer service. It‚Äôs 2022, and like every corporation is looking for a way to screw you out of money. These guys had actual humans answer my phone calls almost every single time, and they even called me back after missing a call! They promptly answered my emails, and they handled my issues until i was 100% satisfied and happy.

Lol i totally sound like i‚Äôm shilling or something. But I genuinely cannot recommend Holy Stone any more strongly. I guess i‚Äôm just shocked to find a corporation nowadays that isn‚Äôt trying to screw me. Low bar i know hah.

title: Feature packed drone at a good price!
text:
Spotted a good deal on this highly rated drone during Amazon Prime days. Glad I went for it!
This is my first drone since the use of GPS became widely used, and wow, what a difference it makes. GPS allows for numerous features that simplify operations and reduce the stress of flying an expensive toy‚Ä¶most notably, to me, is the Return Home feature. Hit that button and it flies right back to you and lands where it took off. No more runaways!
The drone itself is solidly built. I crashed it a couple of times during my (low speed, low altitude) initiation period, and it came through in fine shape. The camera moves in all directions easily, and takes good photos. The controls are fairly intuitive, and once you get the feel of it, very responsive. The suggested app is packed with automated operations, like ‚Äúfollow me‚Äù, and ‚Äúpoint of interest‚Äù. The batteries are good for 26 minutes each, and you get two. Even the included storage was well thought out and well built.
I‚Äôll enjoy this flying machine very much, and look forward to getting great pictures over and around places I could not get to before.
I am glad I picked the Holy Stone HS 720. It‚Äôs a good rig.

text: I ordered this as a Christmas present for my son, and he loves it.

title: Great Drone
text:
This is the first drone I've ever owned, so I don't have anything to compare against, but I found this to be very simple to use. After reading the manual (carefully, twice), it was very easy to setup the connections between the remote, the phone app, and the drone. Just follow the directions, and don't skip steps.

The return-to-home function is a life saver, especially for someone new to using drones. Just make sure you are aware of your surroundings so their are no obstacles between the drone and home base. Again, all clearly documented.

I've found the phone app to be a little more difficult to use, but with practice it should be fine.

I love how compact this drone is once folded-up. The case contains everything you need, and easily fits into a standard laptop backpack.

title: Great product

title: Better than expected for the price
text:
Very nice product. Well built sturdy construction. The quality is better than I expected for the price.

title: I wanted to love it
text:
I wanted to love this drone, but it's terrible. Don't bother.

Control is remarkably difficult once you start flying. GPS is awful regardless of satellites, it'll go into a giant "death spiral" circle when you try to stop, including on rth (where it's unstoppable). Atti control is at least usable, except it wanders off a few hundred feet if you look away for a minute.

Video latency is measured in seconds, making it impossible to fly fpv. Video painful to watch since there's no gimbal. Quality is bad, omnivision sensor is cheap and crappy. Stills are usually blurry, but once in a while you can get one that's usable.

Transmission distance is bad, but the controls are so unfriendly that you'll probably never run into this issue.

Shuts itself off automatically unless it's flying. Even when you've lost it and are looking for it in the woods, even when it's connected and streaming video, even when you're transferring files off.

Actual mechanical design of the quadcopter is excellent, it's taken some nasty tumbles and handled it well. Even when the camera popped off its mount it was easy enough to shove back in without damage. Zero damage after a full-speed 20' crash into a tree.

title: The Holystone HS 720
text: My first new drone in 5 years, and it‚Äôs a winner! There is a learning curve, but with patience learning to fly is straightforward and logical. No problems or issues. The Holystone HS720 is a five star winner!

title: Faulty display on transmitter
text: Just after opening the box and putting the batteries in the transmitter, noticed that there are quite a few dead pixels on the display. This is very disappointing! No quality control before shipping a product? This is probably the easiest problem that the manufacturer can test before shipping. With this type of quality control, wondering how many other things are wrong with this product...

title: First drone
text: My first drone, got it for my birthday and i fly it every day. Camera has good quality and very durable.

title: Impressive Little Gizmo
text: I'm really impressed with the features of this drone, especially for the price point.  The 4k camera takes awesome pictures and video (see attached for a sample).  The drone is great for a beginner as it is easy to learn how to fly and, much to my surprise, handles very well in high winds.  The only issue I've encountered is being able to reliably start the drone.  The short-press of the buttons, as the manual instructs, doesn't seem to work most of the times.  After several attempts, it will finally start and be able to take-off.  Despite this, as it may just be me learning the drone, I would highly recommend this to others.

title: Love at first flight
text: Love at first flight!  However, I‚Äôm extremely annoyed how I just can‚Äôt find a replacement battery ANYWHERE!!! And Holy Stone web site is like sold out of everything.  Any thoughts?

title: Wow..awesome drone
text: Great drone. Fun to fly. Had a user error with the first drone. Holy Stone replaced. Great customer service.

title: Two days
text: Had this drone for two days. Wasn‚Äôt able to fly it yesterday because it was too windy and didn‚Äôt want to break it. Came out the first time this morning and hit the take off button and it went up and side ways. Couldn‚Äôt control it and it flew straight into my chimney. Broke the arm. I don‚Äôt know what happened. I follow all the instructions. It took off fine the first night I got it. Flew it for about ten minutes but didn‚Äôt want to fly too much in the dark. Hopefully there is something Holy stone can do.

title: Excellent Choice!
text:
Finally my fist flight with the HS720 and it was so much fun. The camera worked well, the ability to adjust it is stellar. The drone is quiet, smooth to fly and easy to control. I cannot wait to get another battery so I can extend the flying time.
The control works well, I have an iPhone XS Max so it is a little large since it covers some of the buttons on the top of the controller.
For the price, this is an excellent choice to get a fold able drone with a long flight time and carrying case.

I would buy it again.

title: very disappointed
text: I had one come broken, the second one just flew away, almost like someone else was controlling it. I could see it on the monitor ( my phone) for a little bit. Then it lost connection and I did not see it again. It was only my 3rd time flying it.

title: Solid product and easy to use
text: Product arrived as advertised. Very quick delivery, and seems to have a quality build. Planning on testing this out on a Peru trip in the next few weeks. So far easy to set up and test flight and controls have worked well. Will update this review after puttimg this to the test in higher mountain altitudes.

title: Amazing drone for Everyone
text: I was very pleasantly surprised how high tech and amazing this drone is. This thing does everything and with absolute ease. I bought it for my 14yr old son and he loves it and learned very quickly how to fly this drone with no profit experience of drones before. I‚Äôm so impressed with this drone‚Äôs capabilities, I‚Äôm looking to buy another one the same as my son‚Äôs to fly myself. Bought VR googles that operate off my son‚Äôs IPhone and it just totally enhanced the experience even more. I would seriously give this drone a 10/10. Highly recommended for anyone and everyone!

title: Awesome
text: Best drone I've ever owned. I've bought four. This is my fifth.

title: Very pleased!
text: This was a great purchase for a beginner user. The distance and video clarity exceeded our expectations. Great price!

title: Great drone
text:
This is my first drone, and I love it! There are only a couple issues but overall it has been great.

Issue 1: The camera, it doesn‚Äôt have the quality I was expecting. It is ok when the picture is the size of your phone, but quickly pixelates when you try to zoom in.

Issue 2: Return to home, this is more of an issue of me not understanding the system I think. The first RTH took the drone up to 50ish feet, it then ran into a 60ish foot tall tree. I then reread the directions and decided to try the RTH function in the safety of the living room. I assumed I could cancel the RTH... what happened was when I hit RTH it flew up and hit the ceiling in the house. I couldn‚Äôt cancel it.

On the bright side! I have lightly crashed the drone 5 times now and only had to replace 1 prop, and it was more of a cosmetic replacement.

I highly recommend this drone.

title: Fantastic and new fun
text: [[VIDEOID:ca2e8a54343eedd21fbb3c712c84b9eb]] I'm new to drones.  The HS720 is my first.  It's so simple and easy to use, I was amazed.  There auto take off and land are awesome.  The return to home feature if so cool.  I flew out over the water over 1500 feet away. I couldn't see the drone at all, but still had great connection to the remote.  The RTH feature brought it right back. I'm having so much fun.  I'm going to take it kayak fishing next and I can't wait.  The HS720 is truly an awesome drone.  Thanks Holy Stone.

title: You'll love this drone
text: Great Drone!! Easy to fly and all options work as advertised.

title: Great, durable, and quality drone for the price.
text:
Met my expectations for the price all around, it's an especially durable model (hit a fair share of trees due to sudden gusts of wind) - I haven't even had to replace a propeller yet. Also has exceptional battery life, I get around 25 - 30 minutes of flight time out of one battery consistently (w/o recording, but with the app connected and flying at speed mode 2). The app is intuitive and between the app and user's manual you can figure out even the more 'complex' capabilities of the device and app. The only reason it gets 4 stars is because the video stabilization isn't the greatest (the camera feels *every* movement of the drone and as far as I can tell there aren't any software-side 'stabilizing' features at all).

Will definitely upgrade one day, but for now it's fun to fly around and get some fun (if shaky) arial videos.

title: Easy to fly!
text:
I have never owned a drone before, and I am an old man. I took it out of the box, and within about 20 minutes, it was in the air!
READ THE MANUALS UNDERSTAND THE MANUALS! To be honest, I would recommend reading it 2 or 3 times. And be sure to have it on hand, during the first 2 or 3 flights, anyway. Go slow, and be easy, and everything will work out!
I LOVE it, and am learning something new, every time I fly it!

title: Great beginner drone
text: Overall very happy with this purchase. I had one issue but customer service was very responsive and went above what I expected to make it right!!

title: Good budget drone for arial pics
text: This drone is a good balance between cost and performance. I used this to get arial pics of my 12+ acre property. Camera and video work well. Resolution isn't the best, but considering the cost it's pretty good. The only down sides to this drone are that it takes ~8 hrs it takes to charge the batteries, and it struggles to maintain stability in light wind. The unit will drift slowly in the direction of the wind, even with the GPS function activated. When trying to take pics or video, the drone struggles to maintain a stable picture when trying to compensate for mild, steady-state wind. On a perfectly still day, it does fine, otherwise it's hit or miss if the picture or video comes out well.

title: So easy to set-up and fly! Fantastic drone for the price!
text:
I've been wondering for a while now what the drone hype was all about. Did a fair amount of research and decided on the Holy Stone HS720 as my first drone based on many of the great reviews on YouTube. I'll be first to admit, I'm a major skeptic and take all reviews with a grain of salt, but I can honestly say that I was blown away at the value of this drone.

Everything you need to get flying is in the box, and the included instructions are clear and concise. The drone and controller have a very solid feel and appears well made, much better than I expected considering the price. Setup and calibration of the drone and configuration of the software (on your phone) is super easy and trouble free. The flight performance of the drone and stability in a hover blew me away, I was immediately comfortable with flying this thing knowing that if I got confused about the orientation of the drone all that I had to do was let go of the controls and let the drone right itself and wait for me to figure out what I was doing.

Once I got comfortable with flying I tried out some of the other features such as follow me, orbit, way-point, and return to home and they do work as advertised - pretty neat. Vertical performance was impressive - this thing will rocket-ship straight up, though decent is somewhat slower, I'm assuming it's intentional as a safety measure. Yaw seems to be pretty quick, while roll is somewhat lazy in my opinion. Forward speed is plenty fast enough for a beginner as the drone does get pretty small, pretty fast. Battery life is as advertised at 20-25 minutes for my flights. (Throwing this thing around the sky pretty hard.)

The only slight negative I have is the picture / video quality. I certainly didn't expect DJI performance in this regard based on the low price, but I would like to see something better here. The colors don't really render true to life, the saturation is pretty high, and the lens has a strong fish-eye effect. That being said, it's clear that Holy Stone put it's money into stability and flight performance and that's fantastic for beginners like me.

All in all, it's a great, stable drone for someone getting started in flying drones and are unsure if "it's for them". The included camera and single axis gimble is a bit limited in performance, but it is certainly good enough to whet your appetite for aerial photography.

I have no regrets in buying this drone and would confidently recommend it to anyone getting started in the hobby.

title: Customer support is prompt and helpful
text: Amazing pictures and videos

title: Beautiful Drone With Wonderful Functions!
text:
I have recently purchased this drone as a beginner pilot to get more involved in the drone community. Long story short, I am absolutely engrossed in this drone and its functions. I have flown it about once a day for 6 days in which it has never malfunctioned or flown away. Overall, it is a wonderful drone and you should definitely buy as it is by far the best drone under $300.

Competition
A close competitor to the HS720 would be the Mavic Mini, whose price is over $400. Most if not all functions on both drones are shockingly similar in drone precision and camera quality. The main functions on both drones is the circling Point of Interest, the Return to Home, the waypoint setting, the follow me setting, and the overall stability. Sadly, while the Mavic Mini does include a 3-axis gimbal, the HS720 does not. But I would definitely shave off $100 for the same drone but with no camera gimbal!

Motors
As I have flown my drone, no engines have sputtered out or lost control. The precise stabilization while flying and holding in the air is insurmountable. The quick calculations based on wind speed is wonderful as I have flown it over 10 knots of wind and it stayed relatively stable. Secondly, the brushless motors really do make a difference when coming to noisiness. The drone is mostly quiet and once flown over about 250ft. away, you can't really hear it anymore. Basically, they are great motors!

Camera
The camera does have a little color correction it must fix, but overall it is pretty good. The drone does not include a 2 axis or 3 axis gimbal and there is no way to install one. To fix this, I usually just go to Emulsio and let the app do the camera stabilization work for me! Me, my family, and my friends all agree that my drone footage is amazing at how well it records.

Remote and App
The remote for this drone is very nice as it shows the amount of satellites in the area. If you are not connected to over 10 satellites (I think) in your nearby area, you cannot fly. The nice, bright display on the remote is very useful for flying in the night. The app (called Ophelia GPS) shows live feed from the drone's camera and it allows you to start any function (POI, RTH, or follow me). It is also very user friendly as it is easy to set up and use.

Battery
The battery on this drone is relatively good. It has a flight time of around 20-25 minutes depending on whether you record or not (recording and turning on landing lights can run down the battery faster). It takes 6-7 hours to charge and can be charged overnight. I have never heard of any fires or explosions created by the battery, but I would always keep it in an explosive-proof bag just in case. Also, after flying the drone, the battery can get hot/lukewarm. I would highly suggest to have a "cool down" period after flying to not get the battery too hot and explode.

Functionality
Overall, this drone is very nice as a recreational use of flying. You really can't make movies or record professional videos with the HS720 (as these "Movie Drones" cost $3,000), as it is merely for fun. One thing I would suggest to all beginner drone flyers out there is to make sure you go onto FAADroneZone and register your drone before flying. You will get a unique registration number for your drone to fend away any lawsuits against you and your drone (that is only if you crash).

Lastly, it is a very fun drone to fly and has upscale functions much like the more expensive drones! I have attached a video to show the drone and camera quality! Thanks for reading!

title: True customer service
text: Sometimes one company can restore your faith in what true customer service represents.  HolyStone is one of them.  I purchased the HS720 drone.  The video did not work.  Because of the pandemic, I couldn't test it regularly.  I emailed support numerous times over 3 months.  "Try this, try that", reinstalled software.  No good.  Last resort, try another phone.  Of course I don't carry 2 phones.  It took another 3 weeks before I got the opportunity to use a 2nd phone.  The video worked.  Briefly.  I reconnected my original phone.  It worked!  For 2 mins!  The drone was so far away I couldn't see it.  I pressed the return home and it crashed into a tree. My fault. The drone was way pasted the 30 day warranty.  I emailed HolyStone, "How much it would cost for them to repair it?"  Their response, "I'm glad to assist.  I have processed your new drone package."  Wow, I was not expecting that kind of service.  I tried the new drone today and the video works perfectly with my phone.  Thank you Holystone for restoring my faith in true customer service.

title: WOW! Awesome drone!
text:
First let me say by no means am i an expert with drones or with flying them. In fact this is my very first drone. I LOVE IT!
I am truly a novice. I am able to fly this drone with ease. Its easy to calibrate, the app connects fast and is easy to my iphone and is easy to use. The instructions are clear and very easy to follow. I'm probably going to buy another for my son. I always thought that you needed alot of skill to fly these drones but with HOLY STONES HS720 it takes all that uncertainty and puts it into a fun, super easy to control package. It also comes with a very nice padded carrying case. The 2K camera adjusts up and down from the remote controller and the pics are super clear and crisp. BUY IT you wont regret it! Im a holy stone customer for life!

title: Great value for the money! Lots of great features in this inexpensive drone!
text: The quick start guide was horrible to follow. It missed some vital information needed to start flying!  Do yourself a favor and skip it and go directly to the instructions for use. I thought I would start my 1st flight in the backyard which is fairly open. My mistake was not mastering all the controls before flying over the house to the front yard. Once I did that and lost visual sight of the drone I was very grateful for the return to home feature! Now that I have mastered the controls, it is such a joy to fly! My only complaint is if you Rely on the video shown on your smartphone, there is a slight delay.

title: product support sucks !
text: drone crashed while on auto pilot tried to send it back for repairs and they have offer no repair dept ordered new arm and motor assemblies and they dont work very disapointed  !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

title: This is a very well built drone with great customer support
text: I have had the HS 720 for 2 weeks now and I am truly impressed with both its features and HS tech support. We purchased this for an up coming trip so I have been practicing using it when weather permits. I still have not used all the functions as of yet because of the recent high winds in my area, but so for am pleased with it. I am impressed with the battery flight time of at least 26 mins which is as advertised. I really like being able to save pics and vids directly to the SD card. It is advertised to support up to 32GB SD, but I have been using 128GB SD without any issues. I also really like quality of the case.

title: Awesome drone
text: This was my third drone. The first 2 were not as easy to learn and fly. Love the way this one works and the pictures it takes and the quality is awesome. I recommended it to a couple of friends and the were so happy with their purchase.

title: Flew itself into a barn
text: Started it up for the first time in two months and it decided to fly straight forward on its own. It ended up hitting a barn wall and breaking the cover. I started it again and it did the same thing.

title: Great drone
text: Had this drone for 3 years, great first drone for anyone

title: Easy to use
text: Easy to use right out of box

title: Worth every penny!
text: Not much I didn‚Äôt like. For the price; this drone is amazing! The pictures are great! Video is great! My 8 year old even flew it.

title: It‚Äôs all they say it is.
text: This drone is all they say it is, easy to use great battery life, although I would definitely tell you get the extra batteries. I like to go out for an hr at a time to fly. It does have some issues with wind, it‚Äôs not a heavy drone so small breezes tend to push it around and it messes just a bit with recoding. I have used it to record some motor Corp drills I am involved with as part of the Shriners organization.

title: Beginner drone
text: This is definitely a beginner drone. You will not get high quality pictures that your iphone will take but it still take decent pictures as shown. And the video is a low quality grainy video. just watch the other videos that people write reviews on here. It is fun to fly and move around. I noticed if you are in distance of any other wifi, the wifi used to connect to your phone from the drone with connect and disconnect causing your drone to just sit in the sky for a couple seconds at a time without you being able to control it. If you are near building with a lot of metal, the satellites cut in and out. Would only recommend this to a beginner that is not trying to make money on photos or videos because they will not come out how you anticipate. As shown in the pictures, I am pretty well out in the open with a few houses here and there, and i can only get a few hundred yards away before I lose connectivity.

title: Be patient on set up and follow the steps in order and you'll have a great time.
text: Great little "non-intimidating" drone that have a great bunch of features.  My 16 yr old son was a bit afraid to fly my DJI Phantom 3 Pro.  He would fly with me it didn't want to experiment on a larger more expensive piece of equipment.  We opened the box, charged the battery and he was off and running.  Took it to Joshua Tree National Park and took some great footage (albeit out side the park).  He loves the challenge and relative ease of operation and "as advertised" features of the machine.  Would definitely recommend to anyone - beginner to seasoned vet - as a perfect little drone that can carry the load of providing a great experience.

title: great customer service....great company
text: customer service is outstanding.. great drone excellent pictures

title: Great little drone!
text: Great for a beginner. Easy to navigate and using the phone as a display and direct photo capture is brilliant! Love this drone!
